h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T4.0151^ea^ ^a^V3.0001^ea^ ^a^P4.0150^ea^ ^a^M3.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] {a0 ni0 11.15} ``mettaaya, bhikkhave, cetovimuttiyaa aasevitaaya bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya yaaniikataaya vatthukataaya ^a^V3.0002^ea^ anu.t.thitaaya paricitaaya susamaaraddhaaya a.t.thaanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa. katame a.t.tha? sukha.m supati, sukha.m pa.tibujjhati, na paapaka.m supina.m passati, manussaana.m piyo hoti, amanussaana.m piyo hoti, devataa rakkhanti, naassa aggi vaa visa.m vaa sattha.m vaa kamati, uttari.m appa.tivijjhanto brahmalokuupago hoti. mettaaya, bhikkhave, cetovimuttiyaa aasevitaaya bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya yaaniikataaya vatthukataaya anu.t.thitaaya paricitaaya susamaaraddhaaya ime a.t.thaanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa''ti.
[21] ``yo ^a^T4.0152^ea^ ^a^M3.0002^ea^ ca metta.m bhaavayati, appamaa.na.m pa.tissato {patissato (sii0)}.
[22] tanuu sa.myojanaa honti, passato upadhikkhaya.m..
[21] ``ekampi ^a^P4.0151^ea^ ce paa.namadu.t.thacitto,
[27] mettaayati kusalii tena hoti.
[26] sabbe ca paa.ne manasaanukampii,
[22] pahuutamariyo pakaroti pu~n~na.m..
[21] ``ye sattasa.n.da.m pathavi.m vijetvaa,
[27] raajisayo yajamaanaa anupariyagaa.
[26] assamedha.m purisamedha.m,
[22] sammaapaasa.m vaajapeyya.m niragga.la.m..
[21] ``mettassa cittassa subhaavitassa,
[27] kalampi te naanubhavanti so.lasi.m.
[26] candappabhaa taaraga.naava sabbe,
[22] yathaa na agghanti kalampi so.lasi.m {aya.m paado bahuusu na dissati}..
[21] ``yo na hanti na ghaateti, na jinaati na jaapaye.
[22] metta.mso sabbabhuutaana.m, vera.m tassa na kenacii''ti.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thime ^a^V3.0003^ea^, bhikkhave, hetuu a.t.tha paccayaa aadibrahmacariyikaaya pa~n~naaya appa.tiladdhaaya pa.tilaabhaaya, pa.tiladdhaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa sa.mvattanti. katame a.t.tha? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthaara.m upanissaaya viharati a~n~natara.m vaa garu.t.thaaniya.m sabrahmacaari.m, yatthassa tibba.m hirottappa.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti pema~nca gaaravo ca. aya.m ^a^T4.0153^ea^, bhikkhave, pa.thamo hetu pa.thamo paccayo aadibrahmacariyikaaya pa~n~naaya appa.tiladdhaaya pa.tilaabhaaya, pa.tiladdhaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] ``so ^a^P4.0152^ea^ ta.m satthaara.m upanissaaya viharanto a~n~natara.m vaa garu.t.thaaniya.m sabrahmacaari.m, yatthassa tibba.m hirottappa.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti pema.m gaaravo ^a^M3.0003^ea^ ca, te kaalena kaala.m upasa"nkamitvaa paripucchati paripa~nhati -- `ida.m, bhante, katha.m; imassa ko attho'ti? tassa te aayasmanto aviva.ta~nceva vivaranti, anuttaaniikata~nca uttaanii karonti, anekavihitesu ca ka"nkhaa.thaaniyesu dhammesu ka"nkha.m pa.tivinodenti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo hetu dutiyo paccayo aadibrahmacariyikaaya pa~n~naaya appa.tiladdhaaya pa.tilaabhaaya, pa.tiladdhaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] ``so ta.m dhamma.m sutvaa dvayena vuupakaasena sampaadeti -- kaayavuupakaasena ca cittavuupakaasena ca. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo hetu tatiyo paccayo aadibrahmacariyikaaya pa~n~naaya appa.tiladdhaaya pa.tilaabhaaya, pa.tiladdhaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] ``siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho hetu catuttho paccayo aadibrahmacariyikaaya pa~n~naaya appa.tiladdhaaya pa.tilaabhaaya, pa.tiladdhaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] ``bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo. ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa ^a^V3.0004^ea^ saattha.m sabya~njana.m ^a^T3.0154^ea^ {satthaa sabya~njanaa (ka0 sii0)} kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa {dhataa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo hetu pa~ncamo paccayo aadibrahmacariyikaaya pa~n~naaya appa.tiladdhaaya pa.tilaabhaaya, pa.tiladdhaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] ``aaraddhaviiriyo ^a^P4.0153^ea^ viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. aya.m, bhikkhave, cha.t.tho hetu cha.t.tho paccayo aadibrahmacariyikaaya pa~n~naaya appa.tiladdhaaya pa.tilaabhaaya, pa.tiladdhaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] ``sa"nghagato ^a^M3.0004^ea^ kho pana anaanaakathiko hoti atiracchaanakathiko. saama.m vaa dhamma.m bhaasati para.m vaa ajjhesati ariya.m vaa tu.nhiibhaava.m naatima~n~nati. aya.m, bhikkhave, sattamo hetu sattamo paccayo aadibrahmacariyikaaya pa~n~naaya appa.tiladdhaaya pa.tilaabhaaya, pa.tiladdhaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] ``pa~ncasu kho pana upaadaanakkhandhesu udayabbayaanupassii viharati -- `iti ruupa.m, iti ruupassa samudayo, iti ruupassa attha"ngamo; iti vedanaa, iti vedanaaya samudayo, iti vedanaaya attha"ngamo; iti sa~n~naa...pe0... iti sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... iti vi~n~naa.na.m, iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo, iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo'ti. aya.m, bhikkhave, a.t.thamo hetu a.t.thamo paccayo aadibrahmacariyikaaya pa~n~naaya appa.tiladdhaaya pa.tilaabhaaya, pa.tiladdhaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa sa.mvattati.

[03] ``tamena.m ^a^T4.0155^ea^ sabrahmacaarii eva.m sambhaaventi -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa satthaara.m upanissaaya viharati a~n~natara.m vaa garu.t.thaaniya.m sabrahmacaari.m, yatthassa tibba.m hirottappa.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti pema~nca gaaravo ca. addhaa ayamaayasmaa jaana.m jaanaati passa.m passatii'ti! ayampi dhammo piyattaaya garuttaaya {piyataaya garutaaya (syaa0)} bhaavanaaya saama~n~naaya ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ```ta.m ^a^V3.0005^ea^ kho panaayamaayasmaa satthaara.m upanissaaya viharanto a~n~natara.m vaa garu.t.thaaniya.m sabrahmacaari.m, yatthassa tibba.m hirottappa.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti pema~nca ^a^P4.0154^ea^ gaaravo ca, te kaalena kaala.m upasa"nkamitvaa paripucchati paripa~nhati -- ida.m, bhante, katha.m; imassa ko atthoti? tassa te aayasmanto aviva.ta~nceva vivaranti, anuttaaniikata~nca uttaanii karonti, anekavihitesu ca ka"nkhaa.thaaniyesu dhammesu ka"nkha.m pa.tivinodenti. addhaa ayamaayasmaa jaana.m jaanaati passa.m passatii'ti! ayampi dhammo piyattaaya garuttaaya bhaavanaaya saama~n~naaya ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ```ta.m kho panaayamaayasmaa dhamma.m sutvaa dvayena vuupakaasena sampaadeti -- kaayavuupakaasena ca cittavuupakaasena ca. addhaa ayamaayasmaa jaana.m jaanaati passa.m passatii'ti! ayampi dhammo piyattaaya garuttaaya bhaavanaaya saama~n~naaya ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ```siilavaa ^a^M3.0005^ea^ kho panaayamaayasmaa paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. addhaa ayamaayasmaa jaana.m jaanaati passa.m passatii'ti! ayampi dhammo piyattaaya garuttaaya bhaavanaaya saama~n~naaya ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ```bahussuto kho panaayamaayasmaa ^a^T4.0156^ea^ sutadharo sutasannicayo. ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa. addhaa ayamaayasmaa jaana.m jaanaati passa.m passatii'ti! ayampi dhammo piyattaaya garuttaaya bhaavanaaya saama~n~naaya ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ```aaraddhaviiriyo kho panaayamaayasmaa viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. addhaa ayamaayasmaa jaana.m jaanaati passa.m passatii'ti! ayampi dhammo piyattaaya garuttaaya bhaavanaaya saama~n~naaya ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ```sa"nghagato ^a^P4.0155^ea^ kho panaayamaayasmaa anaanaakathiko hoti atiracchaanakathiko. saama.m vaa dhamma.m ^a^V3.0006^ea^ bhaasati para.m vaa ajjhesati ariya.m vaa tu.nhiibhaava.m naatima~n~nati. addhaa ayamaayasmaa jaana.m jaanaati passa.m passatii'ti! ayampi dhammo piyattaaya garuttaaya bhaavanaaya saama~n~naaya ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ```pa~ncasu kho panaayamaayasmaa upaadaanakkhandhesu udayabbayaanupassii viharati -- iti ruupa.m, iti ruupassa samudayo, iti ruupassa attha"ngamo; iti vedanaa...pe0... iti sa~n~naa...pe0... iti sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... iti vi~n~naa.na.m, iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo, iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamoti. addhaa ayamaayasmaa jaana.m jaanaati passa.m passatii'ti! ayampi dhammo piyattaaya garuttaaya bhaavanaaya saama~n~naaya ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``ime kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha hetuu a.t.tha paccayaa ^a^T4.0157^ea^ aadibrahmacariyikaaya pa~n~naaya appa.tiladdhaaya pa.tilaabhaaya, pa.tiladdhaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa sa.mvattantii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thahi ^a^M3.0006^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi a.t.thahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appiyapasa.msii ca hoti, piyagarahii ca, laabhakaamo ca, sakkaarakaamo ca, ahiriko ca, anottappii ca, paapiccho ca, micchaadi.t.thi ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca.

[03] ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi a.t.thahi? idha ^a^P4.0156^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na appiyapasa.msii ca hoti, na piyagarahii ca, na laabhakaamo ca, na sakkaarakaamo ca, hiriimaa ca hoti, ottappii ca, appiccho ca, sammaadi.t.thi ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahi dhammehi samannaagato ^a^V3.0007^ea^ bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi a.t.thahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu laabhakaamo ca hoti, sakkaarakaamo ca, anava~n~nattikaamo ca, akaala~n~nuu ca, amatta~n~nuu ca, asuci ca, bahubhaa.nii ca, akkosakaparibhaasako ca sabrahmacaariina.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca^a^T4.0158^ea^ agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca.

[03] ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi a.t.thahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na laabhakaamo ca hoti, na sakkaarakaamo ca, na anava~n~nattikaamo ca, kaala~n~nuu ca, matta~n~nuu ca, suci ca, na bahubhaa.nii ca, anakkosakaparibhaasako ca sabrahmacaariina.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thime ^a^M3.0007^ea^, bhikkhave, lokadhammaa loka.m anuparivattanti, loko ca a.t.tha lokadhamme anuparivattati. katame a.t.tha? laabho ^a^P4.0157^ea^ ca, alaabho ca, yaso ca, ayaso ca, nindaa ca, pasa.msaa ca, sukha~nca, dukkha~nca. ime kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha lokadhammaa loka.m anuparivattanti, loko ca ime a.t.tha lokadhamme anuparivattatii''ti.
[21] ``laabho alaabho ca yasaayaso ca,
[27] nindaa pasa.msaa ca sukha.m dukha~nca.
[26] ete ^a^V3.0008^ea^ aniccaa manujesu dhammaa,
[22] asassataa vipari.naamadhammaa..
[21] ``ete ca ~natvaa satimaa sumedho,
[27] avekkhati vipari.naamadhamme.
[26] i.t.thassa dhammaa na mathenti citta.m,
[22] ani.t.thato no pa.tighaatameti..
[21] ``tassaanurodhaa ^a^T4.0159^ea^ atha vaa virodhaa,
[27] vidhuupitaa attha"ngataa na santi.
[26] pada~nca ~natvaa viraja.m asoka.m,
[22] sammappajaanaati bhavassa paaraguu''ti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thime, bhikkhave, lokadhammaa loka.m anuparivattanti, loko ca a.t.tha lokadhamme anuparivattati. katame a.t.tha? laabho ca, alaabho ca, yaso ca, ayaso ca, nindaa ca, pasa.msaa ca, sukha~nca, dukkha~nca. ime kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha lokadhammaa loka.m anuparivattanti, loko ca ime a.t.tha lokadhamme anuparivattati.

[03] ``assutavato, bhikkhave, puthujjanassa uppajjati laabhopi alaabhopi yasopi ayasopi nindaapi pasa.msaapi sukhampi dukkhampi. sutavatopi, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa uppajjati laabhopi alaabhopi yasopi ayasopi nindaapi pasa.msaapi sukhampi dukkhampi. tatra, bhikkhave, ko viseso ^a^P4.0158^ea^ ko ^a^M3.0008^ea^ adhippayaaso {adhippaayo (sii0), adhippaayaso (syaa0 ka.m0) adhi + pa + yasu + .na = adhippayaaso} ki.m naanaakara.na.m sutavato ariyasaavakassa assutavataa puthujjanenaa''ti? ``bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa bhagava.mnettikaa bhagava.mpa.tisara.naa. saadhu vata, bhante, bhagavanta.myeva pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti.

[03] ``tena ^a^V3.0009^ea^ hi, bhikkhave, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``assutavato, bhikkhave, puthujjanassa uppajjati laabho. so na iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `uppanno kho me aya.m laabho; so ca kho anicco dukkho vipari.naamadhammo'ti ^a^T4.0160^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. uppajjati alaabho...pe0... uppajjati yaso... uppajjati ayaso... uppajjati nindaa... uppajjati pasa.msaa... uppajjati sukha.m... uppajjati dukkha.m. so na iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `uppanna.m kho me ida.m dukkha.m; ta~nca kho anicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati''.

[03] ``tassa laabhopi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, alaabhopi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, yasopi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, ayasopi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, nindaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, pasa.msaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, sukhampi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, dukkhampi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati. so uppanna.m laabha.m anurujjhati, alaabhe pa.tivirujjhati; uppanna.m yasa.m anurujjhati, ayase pa.tivirujjhati; uppanna.m pasa.msa.m anurujjhati, nindaaya pa.tivirujjhati; uppanna.m sukha.m anurujjhati, dukkhe pa.tivirujjhati. so eva.m anurodhavirodhasamaapanno na parimuccati jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi. `na parimuccati dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami''.

[03] ``sutavato ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa uppajjati laabho. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `uppanno kho me aya.m laabho; so ca kho anicco dukkho vipari.naamadhammo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. uppajjati alaabho...pe0... uppajjati yaso... uppajjati ^a^P4.0159^ea^ ayaso... uppajjati nindaa... uppajjati pasa.msaa... uppajjati sukha.m... uppajjati dukkha.m. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `uppanna.m kho me ida.m ^a^T4.0161^ea^ dukkha.m; ta~nca kho anicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati''.

[03] ``tassa ^a^M3.0009^ea^ laabhopi citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, alaabhopi citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, yasopi citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, ayasopi citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, nindaapi citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, pasa.msaapi citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, sukhampi citta.m ^a^V3.0010^ea^ na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, dukkhampi citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati. so uppanna.m laabha.m naanurujjhati, alaabhe nappa.tivirujjhati; uppanna.m yasa.m naanurujjhati, ayase nappa.tivirujjhati; uppanna.m pasa.msa.m naanurujjhati, nindaaya nappa.tivirujjhati; uppanna.m sukha.m naanurujjhati, dukkhe nappa.tivirujjhati. so eva.m anurodhavirodhavippahiino parimuccati jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi. `parimuccati dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, viseso aya.m adhippayaaso ida.m naanaakara.na.m sutavato ariyasaavakassa assutavataa puthujjanenaa''ti.
[21] ``laabho alaabho ca yasaayaso ca,
[27] nindaa pasa.msaa ca sukha.m dukha~nca.
[26] ete aniccaa manujesu dhammaa,
[22] asassataa vipari.naamadhammaa..
[21] ``ete ca ~natvaa satimaa sumedho,
[27] avekkhati vipari.naamadhamme.
[26] i.t.thassa ^a^T4.0162^ea^ dhammaa na mathenti citta.m,
[22] ani.t.thato no pa.tighaatameti..
[21] ``tassaanurodhaa ^a^P4.0160^ea^ atha vaa virodhaa,
[27] vidhuupitaa attha"ngataa na santi.
[26] pada~nca ~natvaa viraja.m asoka.m,
[22] sammappajaanaati bhavassa paaraguu''ti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] atha kho vessava.n.no mahaaraajaa -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m {sammi~njita.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya {sammi~njeyya (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, evameva.m mahisavatthusmi.m sa"nkheyyake pabbate va.tajaalikaaya.m antarahito devesu taavati.msesu paaturahosi. atha kho vessava.n.no mahaaraajaa yena sakko devaanamindo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa sakka.m ^a^T4.0165^ea^ devaanaminda.m etadavoca -- ``yagghe maarisa, jaaneyyaasi! eso aayasmaa uttaro mahisavatthusmi.m sa"nkheyyake ^a^P4.0163^ea^ pabbate va.tajaalikaaya.m bhikkhuuna.m ^a^V3.0013^ea^ eva.m dhamma.m deseti -- `saadhaavuso, bhikkhu kaalena kaala.m attavipatti.m paccavekkhitaa hoti ^a^M3.0012^ea^. saadhaavuso, bhikkhu kaalena kaala.m paravipatti.m...pe0... attasampatti.m... parasampatti.m paccavekkhitaa hotii'''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, devaanaminda, gaamassa vaa nigamassa vaa aviduure mahaadha~n~naraasi. tato mahaajanakaayo dha~n~na.m aahareyya -- kaajehipi pi.takehipi uccha"ngehipi ^a^P4.0164^ea^ a~njaliihipi ^a^T4.0166^ea^. yo nu kho, devaanaminda, ta.m mahaajanakaaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m puccheyya -- `kuto ima.m dha~n~na.m aaharathaa'ti, katha.m byaakaramaano nu kho, devaanaminda, so mahaajanakaayo sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyyaa''ti? ```amumhaa mahaadha~n~naraasimhaa aaharaamaa'ti kho, bhante, so mahaajanakaayo sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyyaa''ti. ``evameva.m kho, devaanaminda, ya.m ki~nci subhaasita.m sabba.m ta.m tassa bhagavato vacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. tato upaadaayupaadaaya maya.m ca~n~ne ca bha.naamaa''ti.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ```kulaputto'ti, bhikkhave, nanda.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya. `balavaa'ti, bhikkhave, nanda.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya. `paasaadiko'ti, bhikkhave, nanda.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya. `tibbaraago'ti, bhikkhave, nanda.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya. kima~n~natra, bhikkhave, nando indriyesu guttadvaaro, bhojane matta~n~nuu, jaagariya.m anuyutto, satisampaja~n~nena samannaagato, yehi {yena (ka0)} nando sakkoti paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m! tatrida.m, bhikkhave, nandassa indriyesu guttadvaarataaya hoti. sace ^a^P4.0167^ea^, bhikkhave, nandassa puratthimaa disaa aaloketabbaa hoti, sabba.m cetasaa samannaaharitvaa ^a^T4.0169^ea^ nando puratthima.m disa.m aaloketi -- `eva.m me puratthima.m disa.m aalokayato naabhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassavissantii'ti. itiha tattha sampajaano hoti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``niddhamatheta.m ^a^P4.0169^ea^, bhikkhave, puggala.m; niddhamatheta.m, bhikkhave, puggala.m. apaneyyeso {apaneyyo so (sii0), apaneyyo (syaa0)}, bhikkhave, puggalo. ki.m vo tena paraputtena visodhitena {ki.m voparaputto vihe.thiyati (sii0), ki.m paraputto vihe.theti (syaa0), ki.m vo paraputtaa vihe.theti (pii0), ki.m so paraputto visodheti (ka0)}! idha ^a^T4.0171^ea^, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa taadisa.myeva hoti abhikkanta.m pa.tikkanta.m aalokita.m vilokita.m sami~njita.m pasaarita.m sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.na.m, seyyathaapi a~n~nesa.m bhaddakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m -- yaavassa bhikkhuu aapatti.m na passanti. yato ca khvassa bhikkhuu aapatti.m passanti, tamena.m eva.m jaananti -- `sama.naduusiivaaya.m {sama.naruupii (ka0)} sama.napalaapo sama.nakaara.n.davo'ti {sama.nakara.n.davoti (ka0)}. tamena.m iti viditvaa bahiddhaa naasenti. ta.m kissa hetu? maa a~n~ne bhaddake bhikkhuu duusesii''ti!

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, idhekaccassa puggalassa taadisa.myeva hoti abhikkanta.m pa.tikkanta.m aalokita.m vilokita.m sami~njita.m pasaarita.m sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.na.m, seyyathaapi a~n~nesa.m ^a^V3.0018^ea^ bhaddakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m -- yaavassa ^a^M3.0017^ea^ bhikkhuu aapatti.m na passanti. yato ca khvassa bhikkhuu aapatti.m passanti, tamena.m eva.m jaananti -- `sama.naduusiivaaya.m sama.napalaapo sama.nakaara.n.davo'ti. tamena.m iti viditvaa bahiddhaa naasenti. ta.m kissa ^a^T4.0172^ea^ hetu? maa a~n~ne bhaddake bhikkhuu duusesiiti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, mahato dha~n~naraasissa phu.namaanassa {vuyhamaanassa (sii0 pii0), phusayamaanassa (syaa0), punamaanassa (?)} tattha yaani taani dha~n~naani da.lhaani saaravantaani taani ekamanta.m pu~nja.m hoti, yaani pana taani dha~n~naani dubbalaani palaapaani taani vaato ekamanta.m apavahati {apakassati (sii0)}. tamena.m saamikaa sammajjani.m gahetvaa bhiyyosomattaaya apasammajjanti. ta.m kissa hetu? maa a~n~ne bhaddake dha~n~ne duusesiiti! evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, idhekaccassa puggalassa taadisa.myeva hoti abhikkanta.m pa.tikkanta.m aalokita.m vilokita.m sami~njita.m pasaarita.m sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.na.m, seyyathaapi a~n~nesa.m bhaddakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m -- yaavassa bhikkhuu aapatti.m na passanti. yato ca khvassa bhikkhuu aapatti.m passanti, tamena.m eva.m jaananti ^a^P4.0171^ea^ -- `sama.naduusiivaaya.m sama.napalaapo sama.nakaara.n.davo'ti. tamena.m iti viditvaa bahiddhaa naasenti. ta.m kissa hetu? maa a~n~ne bhaddake bhikkhuu duusesiiti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso udapaanapanaa.liyatthiko ti.nha.m ku.thaari.m {kudhaari.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} aadaaya vana.m paviseyya. so ya.m yadeva rukkha.m ku.thaaripaasena aako.teyya tattha yaani taani rukkhaani da.lhaani saaravantaani taani ku.thaaripaasena aako.titaani kakkha.la.m pa.tinadanti; yaani pana taani rukkhaani antopuutiini avassutaani kasambujaataani taani ku.thaaripaasena aako.titaani daddara.m pa.tinadanti. tamena.m muule chindati, muule chinditvaa agge chindati, agge chinditvaa anto suvisodhita.m visodheti, anto suvisodhita.m visodhetvaa udapaanapanaa.li.m yojeti. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave ^a^T4.0173^ea^, idhekaccassa puggalassa taadisa.myeva hoti abhikkanta.m pa.tikkanta.m aalokita.m vilokita.m sami~njita.m pasaarita.m sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.na.m, seyyathaapi a~n~nesa.m bhaddakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m -- yaavassa bhikkhuu aapatti.m na passanti. yato ca khvassa bhikkhuu aapatti.m passanti, tamena.m eva.m ^a^M3.0018^ea^ jaananti -- `sama.naduusiivaaya.m sama.napalaapo sama.nakaara.n.davo'ti. tamena.m iti viditvaa bahiddhaa naasenti. ta.m kissa hetu? maa a~n~ne bhaddake bhikkhuu duusesii''ti.
[21] ``sa.mvaasaaya.m ^a^V3.0019^ea^ ^a^P4.0172^ea^ vijaanaatha, paapiccho kodhano iti.
[22] makkhii thambhii pa.laasii ca, issukii maccharii sa.tho..
[21] ``santavaaco janavati, sama.no viya bhaasati.
[22] raho karoti kara.na.m, paapadi.t.thi anaadaro..
[21] ``sa.msappii ca musaavaadii, ta.m viditvaa yathaatatha.m.
[22] sabbe samaggaa hutvaana, abhinibbajjayaatha {abhinibbijjayetha (ka0)} na.m..
[21] ``kaara.n.dava.m {kara.n.dava.m (ka0) su0 ni0 283 passitabba.m} niddhamatha, kasambu.m apakassatha {avakassatha (ka0)}.
[22] tato palaape vaahetha, assama.ne sama.namaanine..
[21] ``niddhamitvaana paapicche, paapaaacaaragocare.
[21] suddhaasuddhehi sa.mvaasa.m, kappayavho patissataa.
[22] tato samaggaa nipakaa, dukkhassanta.m karissathaa''ti.. dasama.m.
[06] mettaavaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] metta.m ^a^T4.0174^ea^ pa~n~naa ca dve piyaa, dve lokaa dve vipattiyo.
[22] devadatto ca uttaro, nando kaara.n.davena caati..

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ {paaraa0 1 aadayo} eva.m ^a^V3.0020^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vera~njaaya.m viharati na.lerupucimandamuule. atha kho vera~njo braahma.no ^a^P4.0173^ea^ yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m {saaraa.niiya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} viitisaaretvaa ^a^M3.0019^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho vera~njo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``suta.m meta.m, bho gotama -- `na sama.no gotamo braahma.ne ji.n.ne vu.d.dhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivaadeti vaa paccu.t.theti vaa aasanena vaa nimantetii'ti. tayida.m, bho gotama, tatheva. na hi bhava.m gotamo braahma.ne ji.n.ne vu.d.dhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivaadeti vaa paccu.t.theti vaa aasanena vaa nimanteti. tayida.m, bho gotama, na sampannamevaa''ti. ``naaha.m ta.m, braahma.na, passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya yamaha.m abhivaadeyya.m vaa paccu.t.theyya.m vaa aasanena vaa nimanteyya.m. ya~nhi, braahma.na, tathaagato abhivaadeyya ^a^T4.0175^ea^ vaa paccu.t.theyya vaa aasanena vaa nimanteyya, muddhaapi tassa vipateyyaa''ti.

[03] ``arasaruupo bhava.m gotamo''ti! ``atthi khvesa, braahma.na, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `arasaruupo sama.no gotamo'ti. ye te, braahma.na, ruuparasaa saddarasaa gandharasaa rasarasaa pho.t.thabbarasaa, te tathaagatassa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa {anabhaavakataa (sii0 pii0)} aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. aya.m kho, braahma.na, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `arasaruupo sama.no gotamo'ti, no ca kho ya.m tva.m sandhaaya vadesii''ti {vadesi (sii0 ka0)}.

[03] ``nibbhogo ^a^P4.0174^ea^ bhava.m gotamo''ti! ``atthi khvesa, braahma.na, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena ^a^V3.0021^ea^ sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `nibbhogo sama.no gotamo'ti. ye te, braahma.na, ruupabhogaa saddabhogaa gandhabhogaa rasabhogaa pho.t.thabbabhogaa, te tathaagatassa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. aya.m kho, braahma.na, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `nibbhogo sama.no gotamo'ti, no ca kho ya.m tva.m sandhaaya vadesii''ti.

[03] ``akiriyavaado ^a^M3.0020^ea^ bhava.m gotamo''ti! ``atthi khvesa, braahma.na, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `akiriyavaado sama.no gotamo'ti. aha~nhi, braahma.na, akiriya.m vadaami kaayaduccaritassa vaciiduccaritassa manoduccaritassa; anekavihitaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m akiriya.m ^a^T4.0176^ea^ vadaami. aya.m kho, braahma.na, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `akiriyavaado sama.no gotamo'ti, no ca kho ya.m tva.m sandhaaya vadesii''ti.

[03] ``ucchedavaado bhava.m gotamo''ti! ``atthi khvesa, braahma.na, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `ucchedavaado sama.no gotamo'ti. aha~nhi, braahma.na, uccheda.m vadaami raagassa dosassa mohassa; anekavihitaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m uccheda.m vadaami. aya.m kho, braahma.na, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `ucchedavaado sama.no gotamo'ti, no ca kho ya.m tva.m sandhaaya vadesii''ti.

[03] ``jegucchii bhava.m gotamo''ti! ``atthi khvesa, braahma.na, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `jegucchii sama.no gotamo'ti. aha~nhi, braahma.na, jigucchaami kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena manoduccaritena; jigucchaami anekavihitaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m ^a^P4.0175^ea^ samaapattiyaa. aya.m kho, braahma.na, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `jegucchii sama.no gotamo'ti, no ca kho ya.m tva.m sandhaaya vadesii''ti.

[03] ``venayiko bhava.m gotamo''ti! ``atthi khvesa, braahma.na, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `venayiko sama.no gotamo'ti. aha~nhi, braahma.na, vinayaaya dhamma.m desemi raagassa dosassa mohassa; anekavihitaana.m ^a^T4.0177^ea^ paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m vinayaaya dhamma.m ^a^V3.0022^ea^ desemi. aya.m kho, braahma.na, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `venayiko sama.no gotamo'ti, no ca kho ya.m tva.m sandhaaya vadesii''ti.

[03] ``tapassii bhava.m gotamo''ti! ``atthi khvesa, braahma.na, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `tapassii sama.no gotamo'ti. tapaniiyaaha.m ^a^M3.0021^ea^, braahma.na, paapake akusale dhamme vadaami kaayaduccarita.m vaciiduccarita.m manoduccarita.m. yassa kho, braahma.na, tapaniiyaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa, tamaha.m `tapassii'ti vadaami. tathaagatassa kho, braahma.na, tapaniiyaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. aya.m kho, braahma.na, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `tapassii sama.no gotamo'ti, no ca kho ya.m tva.m sandhaaya vadesii''ti.

[03] ``apagabbho bhava.m gotamo''ti! ``atthi khvesa, braahma.na, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `apagabbho sama.no gotamo'ti. yassa kho, braahma.na, aayati.m gabbhaseyyaa punabbhavaabhinibbatti pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa ^a^P4.0176^ea^, tamaha.m `apagabbho'ti vadaami. tathaagatassa kho, braahma.na ^a^T4.0178^ea^, aayati.m gabbhaseyyaa punabbhavaabhinibbatti pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. aya.m kho, braahma.na, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `apagabbho sama.no gotamo'ti, no ca kho ya.m tva.m sandhaaya vadesi.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, kukku.tiyaa a.n.daani a.t.tha vaa dasa vaa dvaadasa vaa. taanaassu kukku.tiyaa sammaa adhisayitaani sammaa pariseditaani sammaa paribhaavitaani. yo nu kho tesa.m kukku.tacchaapakaana.m pa.thamatara.m paadanakhasikhaaya vaa mukhatu.n.dakena vaa a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa sotthinaa abhinibbhijjeyya, kinti svaassa vacaniiyo -- `je.t.tho vaa kani.t.tho vaa'''ti? ``je.t.tho tissa, bho gotama, vacaniiyo. so hi nesa.m, bho gotama, je.t.tho hotii''ti.

[03] ``evameva.m kho aha.m, braahma.na, avijjaagataaya pajaaya a.n.dabhuutaaya pariyonaddhaaya avijja.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa ekova loke anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho. aha~nhi, braahma.na ^a^V3.0023^ea^, je.t.tho se.t.tho lokassa. aaraddha.m kho pana me, braahma.na, viiriya.m ahosi asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa, passaddho kaayo asaaraddho, samaahita.m citta.m ekagga.m.

[03] ``so ^a^M3.0022^ea^ kho aha.m, braahma.na, vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami; vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m ^a^P4.0177^ea^ jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami; piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharaami sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena ^a^T4.0179^ea^ pa.tisa.mvedemi ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami; sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaraami, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto. so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto. so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaraami.

[03] ``aya.m kho me, braahma.na, rattiyaa pa.thame yaame pa.thamaa vijjaa adhigataa; avijjaa vihataa vijjaa uppannaa; tamo vihato aaloko uppanno, yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato. aya.m kho me, braahma.na, pa.thamaa abhinibbhidaa ahosi kukku.tacchaapakasseva ^a^T4.0180^ea^ a.n.dakosamhaa.

[03] ``so ^a^V3.0024^ea^ ^a^P4.0178^ea^ eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passaami cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite ^a^M3.0023^ea^ suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaami -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa, vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa, manoduccaritena samannaagataa, ariyaana.m upavaadakaa, micchaadi.t.thikaa, micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa. te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaati. ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa, vaciisucaritena samannaagataa, manosucaritena samannaagataa, ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa, sammaadi.t.thikaa, sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa. te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passaami cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaami.

[03] ``aya.m kho me, braahma.na, rattiyaa majjhime yaame dutiyaa vijjaa adhigataa; avijjaa vihataa vijjaa uppannaa; tamo vihato aaloko uppanno, yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato. aya.m kho me, braahma.na, dutiyaa abhinibbhidaa ahosi kukku.tacchaapakasseva a.n.dakosamhaa.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne ^a^T4.0181^ea^ vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m; `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m ^a^P4.0179^ea^ aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m. tassa me eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m ahosi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi.m.

[03] ``aya.m ^a^V3.0025^ea^ kho me, braahma.na, rattiyaa pacchime yaame tatiyaa vijjaa adhigataa; avijjaa vihataa vijjaa uppannaa; tamo vihato aaloko uppanno ^a^M3.0024^ea^, yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato. aya.m kho me, braahma.na, tatiyaa abhinibbhidaa ahosi kukku.tacchaapakasseva a.n.dakosamhaa''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte vera~njo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``je.t.tho bhava.m gotamo, se.t.tho bhava.m gotamo. abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m {nikujjita.m (ka0)} vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m bhotaa gotamena ^a^T4.0182^ea^ anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii santhaagaare {sandhaagaare (ka0)} sannisinnaa sannipatitaa anekapariyaayena buddhassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, dhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, sa"nghassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti.

[03] tena ^a^P4.0180^ea^ kho pana samayena siiho senaapati niga.n.thasaavako tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti. atha kho siihassa senaapatissa etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho bhavissati, tathaa hime sambahulaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii santhaagaare sannisinnaa sannipatitaa anekapariyaayena buddhassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, dhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, sa"nghassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkameyya.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti. atha kho siiho senaapati yena niga.n.tho naa.taputto {naathaputto (ka0 sii0), naataputto (ka0 sii0)} tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, bhante, sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu''nti.

[03] ``ki.m ^a^V3.0026^ea^ ^a^M3.0025^ea^ pana tva.m, siiha, kiriyavaado samaano akiriyavaada.m sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissasi? sama.no hi, siiha, gotamo akiriyavaado, akiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii''ti. atha kho siihassa ^a^T4.0183^ea^ senaapatissa yo ahosi gamiyaabhisa"nkhaaro {gamikaabhisa"nkhaaro (ka0 sii0) mahaava0 290} bhagavanta.m dassanaaya, so pa.tippassambhi.

[03] dutiyampi kho sambahulaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii santhaagaare sannisinnaa sannipatitaa anekapariyaayena buddhassa...pe0... dhammassa...pe0... sa"nghassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti. dutiyampi kho siihassa senaapatissa etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho bhavissati, tathaa hime sambahulaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii santhaagaare sannisinnaa sannipatitaa anekapariyaayena buddhassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, dhammassa...pe0... sa"nghassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkameyya.m arahanta.m ^a^P4.0181^ea^ sammaasambuddha''nti. atha kho siiho senaapati yena niga.n.tho naa.taputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, bhante, sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu''nti.

[03] ``ki.m pana tva.m, siiha, kiriyavaado samaano akiriyavaada.m sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissasi? sama.no hi, siiha, gotamo akiriyavaado akiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii''ti. dutiyampi kho siihassa senaapatissa yo ahosi gamiyaabhisa"nkhaaro bhagavanta.m dassanaaya, so pa.tippassambhi.

[03] tatiyampi kho sambahulaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii santhaagaare sannisinnaa sannipatitaa anekapariyaayena buddhassa...pe0... dhammassa...pe0... sa"nghassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti. tatiyampi kho siihassa ^a^T4.0184^ea^ senaapatissa etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho bhavissati, tathaa hime sambahulaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii santhaagaare sannisinnaa sannipatitaa anekapariyaayena buddhassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, dhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, sa"nghassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti. ki.m hime karissanti niga.n.thaa ^a^M3.0026^ea^ apalokitaa vaa anapalokitaa vaa? ya.mnuunaaha.m anapaloketvaava niga.n.the {niga.n.tha.m (syaa0 ka0) mahaava0 290 passitabba.m} ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkameyya.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti.

[03] atha ^a^V3.0027^ea^ kho siiho senaapati pa~ncamattehi rathasatehi divaadivassa vesaaliyaa niyyaasi bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. yaavatikaa yaanassa bhuumi, yaanena gantvaa yaanaa paccorohitvaa pattikova agamaasi. atha kho siiho senaapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho siiho senaapati bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``suta.m meta.m, bhante -- `akiriyavaado sama.no gotamo, akiriyaaya dhamma.m ^a^P4.0182^ea^ deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'ti. ye te, bhante, evamaaha.msu -- `akiriyavaado sama.no gotamo, akiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'ti, kacci te, bhante, bhagavato vuttavaadino na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhanti dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakaronti na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado {vaadaanupaato (ka0 sii0 syaa0) a0 ni0 3.58; 5.5} gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchati? anabbhakkhaatukaamaa hi maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta''nti.
[03] ``atthi, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `akiriyavaado sama.no gotamo, akiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'''ti ^a^T4.0185^ea^.
[03] ``atthi, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `kiriyavaado sama.no gotamo, kiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'''ti.
[03] ``atthi, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `ucchedavaado sama.no gotamo, ucchedaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'''ti.
[03] ``atthi, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `jegucchii sama.no gotamo, jegucchitaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'''ti.
[03] ``atthi ^a^M3.0027^ea^, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `venayiko sama.no gotamo, vinayaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'''ti.
[03] ``atthi ^a^V3.0028^ea^, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `tapassii sama.no gotamo, tapassitaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'''ti.
[03] ``atthi, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `apagabbho sama.no gotamo, apagabbhataaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'''ti.
[03] ``atthi, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `assaasako sama.no gotamo, assaasaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'''ti.

[03] ``katamo ca, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `akiriyavaado sama.no gotamo, akiriyaaya ^a^P4.0183^ea^ dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'ti? aha~nhi, siiha, akiriya.m vadaami kaayaduccaritassa vaciiduccaritassa manoduccaritassa; anekavihitaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m ^a^T4.0186^ea^ akiriya.m vadaami. aya.m kho, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `akiriyavaado sama.no gotamo, akiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'''ti.

[03] ``katamo ca, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `kiriyavaado sama.no gotamo, kiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'ti? aha~nhi, siiha, kiriya.m vadaami kaayasucaritassa vaciisucaritassa manosucaritassa; anekavihitaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m kiriya.m vadaami. aya.m kho, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `kiriyavaado sama.no gotamo, kiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'''ti.

[03] ``katamo ca, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `ucchedavaado sama.no gotamo, ucchedaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'ti? aha~nhi, siiha, uccheda.m vadaami raagassa dosassa ^a^M3.0028^ea^ mohassa; anekavihitaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m uccheda.m vadaami. aya.m kho, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano ^a^V3.0029^ea^ vadeyya -- `ucchedavaado sama.no gotamo, ucchedaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'''ti.

[03] ``katamo ca, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `jegucchii sama.no gotamo, jegucchitaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'ti? aha~nhi, siiha, jigucchaami kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena ^a^T4.0187^ea^ manoduccaritena; jigucchaami anekavihitaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa. aya.m kho, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `jegucchii sama.no gotamo, jegucchitaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'''ti.

[03] ``katamo ca, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `venayiko sama.no gotamo, vinayaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'ti? aha~nhi, siiha, vinayaaya dhamma.m desemi raagassa dosassa mohassa; anekavihitaana.m ^a^P4.0184^ea^ paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m vinayaaya dhamma.m desemi. aya.m kho, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `venayiko sama.no gotamo, vinayaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'''ti.

[03] ``katamo ca, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `tapassii sama.no gotamo, tapassitaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'ti? tapaniiyaaha.m, siiha, paapake akusale dhamme vadaami kaayaduccarita.m vaciiduccarita.m manoduccarita.m. yassa kho, siiha, tapaniiyaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa, tamaha.m `tapassii'ti vadaami. tathaagatassa kho, siiha, tapaniiyaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. aya.m kho, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `tapassii sama.no ^a^T4.0188^ea^ gotamo, tapassitaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'''ti.

[03] ``katamo ^a^M3.0029^ea^ ca, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `apagabbho sama.no gotamo, apagabbhataaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'ti? yassa kho ^a^V3.0030^ea^, siiha, aayati.m gabbhaseyyaa punabbhavaabhinibbatti pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa, tamaha.m `apagabbho'ti vadaami. tathaagatassa kho, siiha, aayati.m gabbhaseyyaa punabbhavaabhinibbatti pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. aya.m kho, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `apagabbho sama.no gotamo, apagabbhataaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'''ti.

[03] ``katamo ca, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `assaasako sama.no gotamo, assaasaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'ti? aha~nhi, siiha, assaasako ^a^P4.0185^ea^ paramena assaasena, assaasaaya dhamma.m desemi, tena ca saavake vinemi. aya.m kho, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `assaasako sama.no gotamo, assaasaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte siiho senaapati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge ^a^T4.0189^ea^ paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] ``anuviccakaara.m kho, siiha, karohi. anuviccakaaro tumhaadisaana.m ~naatamanussaana.m saadhu hotii''ti. ``iminaapaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato bhiyyosomattaaya attamano abhiraddho, ya.m ma.m bhagavaa evamaaha -- `anuviccakaara.m kho, siiha, karohi. anuviccakaaro tumhaadisaana.m ~naatamanussaana.m saadhu hotii'ti. ma~nhi, bhante, a~n~natitthiyaa saavaka.m labhitvaa kevalakappa.m vesaali.m pa.taaka.m parihareyyu.m -- `siiho amhaaka.m senaapati saavakatta.m upagato'ti. atha ca pana bhagavaa evamaaha -- `anuviccakaara.m, siiha, karohi. anuviccakaaro tumhaadisaana.m ~naatamanussaana.m saadhu hotii'ti. esaaha.m, bhante, dutiyampi bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] ``diigharatta.m ^a^M3.0030^ea^ kho te, siiha, niga.n.thaana.m opaanabhuuta.m kula.m, yena nesa.m upagataana.m pi.n.daka.m daatabba.m ma~n~neyyaasii''ti. ``iminaapaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato bhiyyosomattaaya attamano abhiraddho, ya.m ma.m bhagavaa evamaaha -- `diigharatta.m kho te, siiha, niga.n.thaana.m opaanabhuuta.m kula.m, yena ^a^V3.0031^ea^ nesa.m upagataana.m pi.n.daka.m daatabba.m ma~n~neyyaasii'ti. suta.m meta.m, bhante -- `sama.no gotamo evamaaha -- mayhameva ^a^P4.0186^ea^ daana.m daatabba.m, mayhameva saavakaana.m daatabba.m; mayhameva dinna.m mahapphala.m, na a~n~nesa.m dinna.m mahapphala.m; mayhameva saavakaana.m dinna.m mahapphala.m, na a~n~nesa.m saavakaana.m dinna.m mahapphala'nti, atha ca pana ma.m bhagavaa niga.n.thesupi daane ^a^T4.0190^ea^ samaadapeti {samaadaapeti (?)}. api ca, bhante, mayamettha kaala.m jaanissaama. esaaha.m, bhante, tatiyampi bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa siihassa senaapatissa anupubbi.m katha.m {anupubbikatha.m (sabbattha)} kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m, kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa bhagavaa a~n~naasi siiha.m senaapati.m kallacitta.m muducitta.m viniivara.nacitta.m udaggacitta.m pasannacitta.m, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa ta.m pakaasesi -- dukkha.m samudaya.m nirodha.m magga.m. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya; evameva.m siihassa senaapatissa tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti.

[03] atha kho siiho senaapati di.t.thadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogaa.lhadhammo ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya ^a^P4.0187^ea^ bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] atha kho siiho senaapati bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho siiho senaapati a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- ``gaccha tva.m, ambho purisa ^a^M3.0031^ea^, pavattama.msa.m jaanaahii''ti. atha kho siiho senaapati tassaa rattiyaa accayena sake nivesane pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato ^a^T4.0191^ea^ kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bhante! ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena siihassa senaapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. tena kho pana ^a^V3.0032^ea^ samayena sambahulaa niga.n.thaa vesaaliya.m rathikaaya rathika.m {rathiyaaya rathiya.m (bahuusu)} si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m baahaa paggayha kandanti -- ``ajja siihena senaapatinaa thuula.m pasu.m vadhitvaa sama.nassa gotamassa bhatta.m kata.m. ta.m sama.no gotamo jaana.m uddissakata.m ma.msa.m paribhu~njati pa.ticcakamma''nti.

[03] atha kho a~n~nataro puriso yena siiho senaapati tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa siihassa senaapatissa upaka.n.nake aarocesi -- ``yagghe, bhante, jaaneyyaasi! ete sambahulaa niga.n.thaa vesaaliya.m rathikaaya rathika.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m baahaa paggayha kandanti -- `ajja siihena senaapatinaa thuula.m pasu.m vadhitvaa sama.nassa gotamassa bhatta.m kata.m. ta.m sama.no gotamo jaana.m uddissakata.m ma.msa.m paribhu~njati ^a^P4.0188^ea^ pa.ticcakamma'nti. ala.m ayyo diigharatta~nhi te aayasmanto ava.n.nakaamaa buddhassa ava.n.nakaamaa dhammassa ava.n.nakaamaa sa"nghassa. na ca panete aayasmanto jiridanti ta.m bhagavanta.m asataa tucchaa musaa abhuutena abbhaacikkhitu.m; na ca maya.m jiivitahetupi sa~ncicca paa.na.m jiivitaa voropeyyaamaa''ti.

[03] atha kho siiho senaapati buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi. atha kho siiho senaapati ^a^T4.0192^ea^ bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho siiha.m senaapati.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaamiiti. dutiya.m.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thahi ^a^M3.0032^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhaddo assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi a.t.thahi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no bhaddo assaajaaniiyo ubhato sujaato hoti -- maatito ca pitito ca. yassa.m disaaya.m a~n~nepi bhaddaa assaajaaniiyaa jaayanti, tassa.m disaaya.m jaato hoti. ya.m kho panassa bhojana.m denti -- alla.m vaa sukkha.m vaa -- ta.m sakkacca.myeva paribhu~njati avikiranto. jegucchii hoti uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa abhinisiiditu.m vaa abhinipajjitu.m vaa. sorato hoti ^a^P4.0189^ea^ sukhasa.mvaaso, na ca a~n~ne asse ubbejetaa. yaani kho panassa honti {yaani kho panassa taani (syaa0)} saa.theyyaani kuu.teyyaani jimheyyaani va"nkeyyaani, taani yathaabhuuta.m saarathissa aavikattaa hoti. tesamassa saarathi ^a^V3.0033^ea^ abhinimmadanaaya vaayamati. vaahii kho pana hoti. `kaama~n~ne assaa vahantu vaa maa vaa, ahamettha vahissaamii'ti citta.m uppaadeti. gacchanto kho pana ujumaggeneva gacchati. thaamavaa hoti yaava jiivitamara.napariyaadaanaa thaama.m upada.msetaa. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhaddo assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahi dhammehi ^a^T4.0193^ea^ samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi a.t.thahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. ya.m kho panassa bhojana.m denti -- luukha.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa -- ta.m sakkacca.myeva paribhu~njati aviha~n~namaano. jegucchii hoti kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena manoduccaritena; jegucchii hoti anekavihitaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa. sorato hoti sukhasa.mvaaso, na a~n~ne bhikkhuu ubbejetaa. yaani kho panassa honti saa.theyyaani kuu.teyyaani ^a^P4.0190^ea^ jimheyyaani va"nkeyyaani, taani yathaabhuuta.m aavikattaa hoti satthari vaa vi~n~nuusu vaa sabrahmacaariisu. tesamassa satthaa vaa vi~n~nuu vaa sabrahmacaarii abhinimmadanaaya vaayamati. sikkhitaa kho pana hoti. `kaama~n~ne ^a^M3.0033^ea^ bhikkhuu sikkhantu vaa maa vaa, ahamettha sikkhissaamii'ti citta.m uppaadeti. gacchanto kho pana ujumaggeneva gacchati; tatraaya.m ujumaggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. aaraddhaviiriyo viharati -- `kaama.m taco ca nhaaru {nahaaru (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ca a.t.thi ca avasissatu, sariire upasussatu ma.msalohita.m; ya.m ta.m purisathaamena purisaviiriyena purisaparakkamena pattabba.m, na ta.m apaapu.nitvaa viiriyassa sa.n.thaana.m bhavissatii'ti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti ^a^T4.0194^ea^. tatiya.m.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.tha ca {a.t.tha (syaa0)}, bhikkhave, assakha.lu"nke {assakhalu"nke (sii0)} desessaami a.t.tha ca assadose, a.t.tha ca purisakha.lu"nke a.t.tha ca purisadose. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katame ^a^V3.0034^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, a.t.tha assakha.lu"nkaa a.t.tha ca assadosaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco assakha.lu"nko `pehii'ti vutto, viddho samaano codito saarathinaa pacchato pa.tikkamati, pi.t.thito ^a^P4.0191^ea^ ratha.m pavatteti. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakha.lu"nko hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo assadoso.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakha.lu"nko `pehii'ti vutto, viddho samaano codito saarathinaa pacchaa la"nghati, kubbara.m hanati, tida.n.da.m bha~njati. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakha.lu"nko hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo assadoso.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakha.lu"nko `pehii'ti vutto, viddho samaano codito saarathinaa rathiisaaya satthi.m ussajjitvaa rathiisa.myeva ajjhomaddati. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakha.lu"nko hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo assadoso.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakha.lu"nko `pehii'ti vutto, viddho samaano codito saarathinaa ummagga.m ga.nhati, ubba.tuma.m ratha.m karoti. evaruupopi ^a^M3.0034^ea^, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakha.lu"nko hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho assadoso.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakha.lu"nko `pehii'ti vutto, viddho samaano codito saarathinaa la"nghati purimakaaya.m pagga.nhati purime paade. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakha.lu"nko ^a^T4.0195^ea^ hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo assadoso.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakha.lu"nko `pehii'ti vutto, viddho samaano codito saarathinaa anaadiyitvaa saarathi.m anaadiyitvaa patodala.t.thi.m {patoda.m (sii0 pii0), patodaya.t.thi.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} dantehi mukhaadhaana.m {mukhaa.thaana.m (ka0)} vidha.msitvaa ^a^P4.0192^ea^ yena kaama.m pakkamati. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakha.lu"nko hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, cha.t.tho assadoso.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakha.lu"nko `pehii'ti vutto, viddho samaano codito ^a^V3.0035^ea^ saarathinaa neva abhikkamati no pa.tikkamati tattheva khiila.t.thaayii .thito hoti. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakha.lu"nko hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, sattamo assadoso.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakha.lu"nko `pehii'ti vutto, viddho samaano codito saarathinaa purime ca paade sa.mharitvaa pacchime ca paade sa.mharitvaa {sa"nkharitvaa (ka0)} tattheva cattaaro paade abhinisiidati. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakha.lu"nko hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, a.t.thamo assadoso. ime kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha assakha.lu"nkaa a.t.tha ca assadosaa.

[03] {vibha0 956} ``katame ca, bhikkhave, a.t.tha purisakha.lu"nkaa a.t.tha ca purisadosaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m aapattiyaa codenti. so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi aapattiyaa codiyamaano `na saraamii'ti asatiyaa nibbe.theti. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, assakha.lu"nko `pehii'ti vutto, viddho samaano codito saarathinaa pacchato pa.tikkamati, pi.t.thito ratha.m vatteti; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco purisakha.lu"nko hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo purisadoso.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0035^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave ^a^T4.0196^ea^, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m aapattiyaa codenti. so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi aapattiyaa codiyamaano codaka.myeva ^a^P4.0193^ea^ pa.tippharati -- `ki.m nu kho tuyha.m baalassa abyattassa bha.nitena! tvampi naama bha.nitabba.m ma~n~nasii'ti! seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, assakha.lu"nko `pehii'ti vutto, viddho samaano codito saarathinaa pacchaa la"nghati, kubbara.m hanati, tida.n.da.m bha~njati; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco purisakha.lu"nko hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo purisadoso.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m aapattiyaa codenti. so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi aapattiyaa codiyamaano codakasseva paccaaropeti -- `tva.m khosi itthannaama.m aapatti.m aapanno, tva.m taava pa.thama.m pa.tikarohii'ti. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, assakha.lu"nko `pehii'ti vutto, viddho samaano codito saarathinaa rathiisaaya satthi.m ussajjitvaa rathiisa.myeva ajjhomaddati; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco purisakha.lu"nko hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo purisadoso.

[03] ``puna ^a^V3.0036^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m aapattiyaa codenti. so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi aapattiyaa codiyamaano a~n~nenaa~n~na.m pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, assakha.lu"nko `pehii'ti vutto, viddho samaano codito saarathinaa ummagga.m ga.nhati, ubba.tuma.m ratha.m karoti; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco purisakha.lu"nko hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho purisadoso.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m aapattiyaa ^a^T4.0197^ea^ codenti. so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi aapattiyaa codiyamaano sa"nghamajjhe baahuvikkhepa.m karoti. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave ^a^P4.0194^ea^, assakha.lu"nko `pehii'ti vutto, viddho samaano codito saarathinaa la"nghati, purimakaaya.m pagga.nhati purime paade; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco purisakha.lu"nko hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo purisadoso.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0036^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m aapattiyaa codenti. so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi aapattiyaa codiyamaano anaadiyitvaa sa"ngha.m anaadiyitvaa codaka.m saapattikova yena kaama.m pakkamati. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, assakha.lu"nko `pehii'ti vutto, viddho samaano codito saarathinaa anaadiyitvaa saarathi.m anaadiyitvaa patodala.t.thi.m dantehi mukhaadhaana.m vidha.msitvaa yena kaama.m pakkamati; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco purisakha.lu"nko hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, cha.t.tho purisadoso.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m aapattiyaa codenti. so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi aapattiyaa codiyamaano `nevaaha.m aapannomhi, na panaaha.m aapannomhii'ti so tu.nhiibhaavena sa"ngha.m vihe.theti {viheseti (pii0 ka0)}. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, assakha.lu"nko `pehii'ti vutto, viddho samaano codito saarathinaa neva abhikkamati no pa.tikkamati tattheva khiila.t.thaayii .thito hoti; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco purisakha.lu"nko hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, sattamo purisadoso.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhikkhu.m aapattiyaa codenti. so bhikkhu bhikkhuuhi aapattiyaa ^a^V3.0037^ea^ codiyamaano evamaaha ^a^T4.0198^ea^ ^a^P4.0195^ea^ -- `ki.m nu kho tumhe aayasmanto atibaa.lha.m mayi byaava.taa yaava {ida.m pada.m siiha.lapotthake natthi} idaanaaha.m sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissaamii'ti. so sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattitvaa evamaaha -- `idaani kho tumhe aayasmanto attamanaa hothaa'ti? seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, assakha.lu"nko `pehii'ti vutto, viddho samaano codito saarathinaa purime ca paade sa.mharitvaa pacchime ca paade sa.mharitvaa tattheva cattaaro paade abhinisiidati; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco purisakha.lu"nko hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, a.t.thamo purisadoso. ime kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha purisakha.lu"nkaa a.t.tha ca purisadosaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thimaani ^a^M3.0037^ea^, bhikkhave, malaani. katamaani a.t.tha? asajjhaayamalaa, bhikkhave, mantaa; anu.t.thaanamalaa, bhikkhave, gharaa; mala.m, bhikkhave, va.n.nassa kosajja.m; pamaado, bhikkhave, rakkhato mala.m; mala.m, bhikkhave, itthiyaa duccarita.m; macchera.m, bhikkhave, dadato mala.m; malaa, bhikkhave, paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa asmi.m loke paramhi ca; tato {tato ca (syaa0 pii0)}, bhikkhave, malaa malatara.m avijjaa parama.m mala.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha malaanii''ti.
[21] ``asajjhaayamalaa mantaa, anu.t.thaanamalaa gharaa.
[22] mala.m va.n.nassa kosajja.m, pamaado rakkhato mala.m..
[21] ``malitthiyaa duccarita.m, macchera.m dadato mala.m.
[26] malaa ve paapakaa dhammaa, asmi.m loke paramhi ca.
[22] tato malaa malatara.m, avijjaa parama.m mala''nti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 347} ``a.t.thahi ^a^T4.0199^ea^ ^a^P4.0196^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu duuteyya.m gantumarahati. katamehi a.t.thahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotaa ca hoti, saavetaa ca, uggahetaa ca, dhaaretaa ca, vi~n~naataa ^a^V3.0038^ea^ ca, vi~n~naapetaa ca, kusalo ca sahitaasahitassa, no ca kalahakaarako -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu duuteyya.m gantumarahati. a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato saariputto duuteyya.m gantumarahati. katamehi a.t.thahi? idha, bhikkhave, saariputto sotaa ca hoti, saavetaa ca, uggahetaa ca, dhaaretaa ca, vi~n~naataa ca, vi~n~naapetaa ca, kusalo ca sahitaasahitassa, no ca kalahakaarako. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahi dhammehi samannaagato saariputto duuteyya.m gantumarahatii''ti.
[21] ``yo ve na byathati {na vedhati (sii0), na byaadhati (syaa0 pii0)} patvaa, parisa.m uggavaadini.m {uggavaadina.m (sii0), uggahavaadina.m (syaa0 pii0), uggatavaadini.m (ka0)}.
[22] na ca haapeti vacana.m, na ca chaadeti saasana.m..
[21] ``asandiddha~nca ^a^M3.0038^ea^ bha.nati {asandiddho ca akkhaati (cuu.lava0 347)}, pucchito na ca kuppati.
[22] sa ve taadisako bhikkhu, duuteyya.m gantumarahatii''ti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, aakaarehi itthii purisa.m bandhati. katamehi a.t.thahi? ru.n.nena, bhikkhave, itthii purisa.m bandhati; hasitena, bhikkhave, itthii purisa.m bandhati; bha.nitena, bhikkhave, itthii purisa.m bandhati; aakappena, bhikkhave, itthii purisa.m bandhati ^a^P4.0197^ea^; vanabha"ngena, bhikkhave, itthii purisa.m bandhati; gandhena, bhikkhave, itthii purisa.m bandhati; rasena, bhikkhave, itthii purisa.m bandhati; phassena, bhikkhave, itthii purisa.m bandhati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahaakaarehi ^a^T4.0200^ea^ itthii purisa.m bandhati. te, bhikkhave, sattaa subaddhaa {subandhaa (sii0 syaa0 ka0)}, ye {yeva (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} phassena baddhaa''ti {bandhaati (sii0 syaa0 ka0)}. sattama.m.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, aakaarehi puriso itthi.m bandhati. katamehi a.t.thahi? ru.n.nena, bhikkhave, puriso itthi.m bandhati; hasitena, bhikkhave, puriso itthi.m bandhati; bha.nitena, bhikkhave, puriso itthi.m bandhati; aakappena, bhikkhave, puriso itthi.m bandhati; vanabha"ngena, bhikkhave, puriso itthi.m bandhati; gandhena, bhikkhave, puriso itthi.m bandhati; rasena, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0039^ea^, puriso itthi.m bandhati; phassena, bhikkhave, puriso itthi.m bandhati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahaakaarehi puriso itthi.m bandhati. te, bhikkhave, sattaa subaddhaa, ye phassena baddhaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vera~njaaya.m vi harati na.lerupucimandamuule. atha kho pahaaraado asurindo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thita.m kho pahaaraada.m asurinda.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``api ^a^M3.0039^ea^ {ki.m (ka0)} pana, pahaaraada ^a^P4.0198^ea^, asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramantii''ti? ``abhiramanti, bhante, asuraa mahaasamudde''ti. ``kati pana, pahaaraada, mahaasamudde acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa {abbhutadhammaa (syaa0 ka0) cuu.lava0 384 passitabba.m}, ye disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramantii''ti? ``a.t.tha, bhante, mahaasamudde acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa, ye disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti. katame a.t.tha? mahaasamuddo, bhante, anupubbaninno anupubbapo.no anupubbapabbhaaro ^a^T4.0201^ea^, na aayatakeneva papaato. yampi, bhante, mahaasamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapo.no anupubbapabbhaaro, na aayatakeneva papaato. aya.m, bhante, mahaasamudde pa.thamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, mahaasamuddo .thitadhammo vela.m naativattati. yampi, bhante, mahaasamuddo .thitadhammo vela.m naativattati; aya.m {ayampi (ka0)}, bhante, mahaasamudde dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, mahaasamuddo na matena ku.napena sa.mvasati {sa.mvattati (syaa0)}. ya.m hoti mahaasamudde mata.m ku.napa.m, ta.m khippameva {khippa.myeva (sii0), khippa.meva (pii0), khippa~n~neva (cuu.lava0 384)} tiira.m vaaheti, thala.m ussaareti. yampi, bhante, mahaasamuddo na matena ku.napena sa.mvasati, ya.m hoti mahaasamudde mata.m ku.napa.m, ta.m khippameva tiira.m vaaheti, thala.m ussaareti; aya.m, bhante, mahaasamudde tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03] ``puna ^a^V3.0040^ea^ capara.m, bhante, yaa kaaci mahaanadiyo, seyyathida.m -- ga"ngaa yamunaa aciravatii sarabhuu mahii, taa mahaasamudda.m patvaa {pattaa (ka0, cuu.lava0 384)} jahanti purimaani naamagottaani, `mahaasamuddo' ^a^P4.0199^ea^ tveva sa"nkha.m gacchanti. yampi, bhante, yaa kaaci mahaanadiyo, seyyathida.m -- ga"ngaa yamunaa aciravatii sarabhuu mahii, taa mahaasamudda.m patvaa jahanti purimaani naamagottaani, `mahaasamuddo' tveva sa"nkha.m gacchanti; aya.m, bhante, mahaasamudde catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0040^ea^ capara.m, bhante, yaa ca {yaa kaaci (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} loke savantiyo mahaasamudda.m ^a^T4.0202^ea^ appenti yaa ca antalikkhaa dhaaraa papatanti, na tena mahaasamuddassa uunatta.m vaa puuratta.m vaa pa~n~naayati. yampi, bhante, yaa ca loke savantiyo mahaasamudda.m appenti yaa ca antalikkhaa dhaaraa papatanti, na tena mahaasamuddassa uunatta.m vaa puuratta.m vaa pa~n~naayati; aya.m, bhante, mahaasamudde pa~ncamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, mahaasamuddo ekaraso lo.naraso. yampi, bhante, mahaasamuddo ekaraso lo.naraso; aya.m, bhante, mahaasamudde cha.t.tho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, mahaasamuddo bahuratano {pahuutaratano (ka0)} anekaratano. tatrimaani ratanaani, seyyathida.m -- muttaa ma.ni ve.luriyo sa"nkho silaa pavaa.la.m rajata.m jaataruupa.m lohitako masaaragalla.m. yampi, bhante, mahaasamuddo bahuratano anekaratano; tatrimaani ratanaani, seyyathida.m -- muttaa ma.ni ve.luriyo sa"nkho silaa pavaa.la.m rajata.m jaataruupa.m lohitako masaaragalla.m. aya.m, bhante, mahaasamudde ^a^P4.0200^ea^ sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, mahaasamuddo mahata.m bhuutaana.m aavaaso. tatrime bhuutaa -- timi timi"ngalo timirapi"ngalo {timitimi"ngalaa timirapi"ngalaa (sii0), timitimi"ngalaa timirami"ngalaa (syaa0 pii0)} asuraa naagaa gandhabbaa. santi mahaasamudde yojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa, dviyojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa, tiyojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa, catuyojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa, pa~ncayojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa. yampi, bhante, mahaasamuddo mahata.m ^a^T4.0203^ea^ bhuutaana.m ^a^V3.0041^ea^ aavaaso; tatrime bhuutaa -- timi timi"ngalo timirapi"ngalo asuraa naagaa gandhabbaa; santi mahaasamudde yojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa...pe0... dviyojana... tiyojana... catuyojana... pa~ncayojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa; aya.m, bhante, mahaasamudde a.t.thamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti. ime kho, bhante ^a^M3.0041^ea^, mahaasamudde a.t.tha acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa, ye disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramantiiti.

[03] ``api pana, bhante, bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramantii''ti? ``abhiramanti, pahaaraada, bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye''ti. ``kati pana, bhante, imasmi.m dhammavinaye acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa, ye disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramantii''ti? ``a.t.tha, pahaaraada, imasmi.m dhammavinaye acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa, ye disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti. katame a.t.tha? seyyathaapi, pahaaraada, mahaasamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapo.no anupubbapabbhaaro, na aayatakeneva papaato ^a^P4.0201^ea^; evameva.m kho, pahaaraada, imasmi.m dhammavinaye anupubbasikkhaa anupubbakiriyaa anupubbapa.tipadaa, na aayatakeneva a~n~naapa.tivedho. yampi, pahaaraada, imasmi.m dhammavinaye anupubbasikkhaa anupubbakiriyaa anupubbapa.tipadaa, na aayatakeneva a~n~naapa.tivedho. aya.m, pahaaraada, imasmi.m dhammavinaye pa.thamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, pahaaraada, mahaasamuddo .thitadhammo vela.m naativattati; evameva.m kho, pahaaraada, ya.m mayaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m ta.m mama saavakaa ^a^T4.0204^ea^ jiivitahetupi naatikkamanti. yampi, pahaaraada, mayaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m ta.m mama saavakaa jiivitahetupi naatikkamanti. aya.m, pahaaraada, imasmi.m dhammavinaye dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, pahaaraada, mahaasamuddo na matena ku.napena sa.mvasati. ya.m hoti mahaasamudde mata.m ku.napa.m, ta.m khippameva tiira.m vaaheti thala.m ussaareti; evameva.m kho, pahaaraada, yo so puggalo dussiilo paapadhammo asucisa"nkassarasamaacaaro pa.ticchannakammanto assama.no sama.napa.ti~n~no ^a^V3.0042^ea^ abrahmacaarii brahmacaaripa.ti~n~no antopuuti avassuto kasambujaato, na tena sa"ngho sa.mvasati; khippameva na.m sannipatitvaa ukkhipati.

[03] ``ki~ncaapi so hoti majjhe bhikkhusa"nghassa sannisinno, atha kho so aarakaava sa"nghamhaa sa"ngho ca tena. yampi, pahaaraada, yo so puggalo ^a^M3.0042^ea^ dussiilo paapadhammo asucisa"nkassarasamaacaaro pa.ticchannakammanto assama.no sama.napa.ti~n~no abrahmacaarii brahmacaaripa.ti~n~no antopuuti avassuto kasambujaato, na ^a^P4.0202^ea^ tena sa"ngho sa.mvasati; khippameva na.m sannipatitvaa ukkhipati; ki~ncaapi so hoti majjhe bhikkhusa"nghassa sannisinno, atha kho so aarakaava sa"nghamhaa sa"ngho ca tena. aya.m, pahaaraada, imasmi.m dhammavinaye tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, pahaaraada, yaa kaaci mahaanadiyo, seyyathida.m -- ga"ngaa yamunaa aciravatii sarabhuu mahii, taa mahaasamudda.m patvaa jahanti purimaani naamagottaani, `mahaasamuddo' ^a^T4.0205^ea^ tveva sa"nkha.m gacchanti; evameva.m kho, pahaaraada, cattaarome va.n.naa -- khattiyaa, braahma.naa, vessaa, suddaa, te tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitvaa jahanti purimaani naamagottaani, `sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa' tveva {sama.no sakyaputtiyo tveva (syaa0 ka0)} sa"nkha.m gacchanti. yampi, pahaaraada, cattaarome va.n.naa -- khattiyaa, braahma.naa, vessaa, suddaa, te tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitvaa jahanti purimaani naamagottaani, `sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa' tveva sa"nkha.m gacchanti. aya.m, pahaaraada, imasmi.m dhammavinaye catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, pahaaraada, yaa ca loke savantiyo mahaasamudda.m appenti yaa ca antalikkhaa dhaaraa papatanti, na tena mahaasamuddassa uunatta.m vaa puuratta.m vaa pa~n~naayati; evameva.m kho, pahaaraada, bahuu cepi bhikkhuu anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayanti, na tena nibbaanadhaatuyaa uunatta.m vaa puuratta.m vaa pa~n~naayati. yampi, pahaaraada, bahuu cepi bhikkhuu anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa ^a^P4.0203^ea^ parinibbaayanti, na tena nibbaanadhaatuyaa uunatta.m vaa puuratta.m vaa pa~n~naayati. aya.m, pahaaraada, imasmi.m dhammavinaye pa~ncamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0043^ea^, pahaaraada, mahaasamuddo ekaraso lo.naraso; evameva.m kho, pahaaraada, aya.m dhammavinayo ekaraso, vimuttiraso. yampi pahaaraada ^a^M3.0043^ea^, aya.m dhammavinayo ekaraso, vimuttiraso ^a^T4.0206^ea^; aya.m, pahaaraada, imasmi.m dhammavinaye cha.t.tho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, pahaaraada, mahaasamuddo bahuratano anekaratano; tatrimaani ratanaani, seyyathida.m -- muttaa ma.ni ve.luriyo sa"nkho silaa pavaa.la.m rajata.m jaataruupa.m lohitako masaaragalla.m; evameva.m kho, pahaaraada, aya.m dhammavinayo bahuratano anekaratano. tatrimaani ratanaani, seyyathida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa, cattaaro sammappadhaanaa, cattaaro iddhipaadaa, pa~ncindriyaani, pa~nca balaani, satta bojjha"ngaa, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. yampi, pahaaraada, aya.m dhammavinayo bahuratano anekaratano; tatrimaani ratanaani, seyyathida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa, cattaaro sammappadhaanaa, cattaaro iddhipaadaa, pa~ncindriyaani, pa~nca balaani, satta bojjha"ngaa, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo; aya.m, pahaaraada, imasmi.m dhammavinaye sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, pahaaraada, mahaasamuddo mahata.m bhuutaana.m aavaaso; tatrime bhuutaa -- timi timi"ngalo timirapi"ngalo ^a^P4.0204^ea^ asuraa naagaa gandhabbaa; santi mahaasamudde yojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa, dviyojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa, tiyojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa, catuyojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa, pa~ncayojanasatikaapi attabhaavaa; evameva.m kho, pahaaraada, aya.m dhammavinayo mahata.m bhuutaana.m aavaaso; tatrime bhuutaa -- sotaapanno sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno, sakadaagaamii sakadaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya ^a^T4.0207^ea^ pa.tipanno, anaagaamii anaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno, arahaa arahattaaya pa.tipanno. yampi, pahaaraada, aya.m dhammavinayo mahata.m bhuutaana.m aavaaso; tatrime bhuutaa -- sotaapanno sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno, sakadaagaamii sakadaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno, anaagaamii anaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno, arahaa arahattaaya pa.tipanno; aya.m, pahaaraada, imasmi.m dhammavinaye a.t.thamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramanti. ime kho, pahaaraada, imasmi.m dhammavinaye a.t.tha ^a^M3.0044^ea^ acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa, ye disvaa disvaa bhikkhuu imasmi.m dhammavinaye abhiramantii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 383; udaa0 45; kathaa0 346} eka.m ^a^V3.0044^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa tadahuposathe bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto nisinno hoti. atha kho aayasmaa aanando abhikkantaaya rattiyaa, nikkhante pa.thame yaame, u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkantaa, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto pa.thamo yaamo, ciranisinno bhikkhusa"ngho. uddisatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m paatimokkha''nti.

[03] eva.m vutte bhagavaa tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi ^a^P4.0205^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando abhikkantaaya rattiyaa, nikkhante majjhime yaame, u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkantaa, bhante ^a^T4.0208^ea^, ratti, nikkhanto majjhimo yaamo, ciranisinno bhikkhusa"ngho. uddisatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m paatimokkha''nti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa tu.nhii ahosi. tatiyampi kho aayasmaa aanando abhikkantaaya rattiyaa, nikkhante pacchime yaame, uddhaste aru.ne, nandimukhiyaa rattiyaa u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkantaa, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto pacchimo yaamo, uddhasta.m aru.na.m, nandimukhii ratti; ciranisinno bhikkhusa"ngho. uddisatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m paatimokkha''nti. ``aparisuddhaa, aananda, parisaa''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa etadahosi -- ``ka.m nu kho bhagavaa puggala.m sandhaaya evamaaha -- `aparisuddhaa, aananda, parisaa'''ti? atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano sabbaavanta.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m cetasaa ceto paricca manasaakaasi. addasaa kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ta.m puggala.m dussiila.m paapadhamma.m asuci.m sa"nkassarasamaacaara.m pa.ticchannakammanta.m assama.na.m sama.napa.ti~n~na.m abrahmacaari.m brahmacaaripa.ti~n~na.m antopuuti.m avassuta.m kasambujaata.m majjhe bhikkhusa"nghassa nisinna.m; disvaana u.t.thaayaasanaa yena so puggalo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m puggala.m ^a^M3.0045^ea^ etadavoca -- ``u.t.thehaavuso, di.t.thosi bhagavataa. natthi te bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m sa.mvaaso''ti.

[03] eva.m ^a^V3.0045^ea^ vutte so puggalo tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ta.m puggala.m etadavoca -- ``u.t.thehaavuso, di.t.thosi bhagavataa. natthi ^a^T4.0209^ea^ te bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m sa.mvaaso''ti. dutiyampi kho so puggalo tu.nhii ahosi. tatiyampi kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ta.m puggala.m etadavoca ^a^P4.0206^ea^ -- ``u.t.thehaavuso, di.t.thosi bhagavataa. natthi te bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m sa.mvaaso''ti. tatiyampi kho so puggalo tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ta.m puggala.m baahaaya.m gahetvaa bahidvaarako.t.thakaa nikkhaametvaa suucigha.tika.m datvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``nikkhaamito so, bhante, puggalo mayaa. parisuddhaa parisaa. uddisatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m paatimokkha''nti. ``acchariya.m, moggallaana, abbhuta.m, moggallaana! yaava baahaa gaha.naapi naama so moghapuriso aagamissatii''ti!

[03] atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tumheva daani, bhikkhave, uposatha.m kareyyaatha, paatimokkha.m uddiseyyaatha. na daanaaha.m, bhikkhave, ajjatagge uposatha.m karissaami, paatimokkha.m uddisissaami. a.t.thaanameta.m, bhikkhave, anavakaaso ya.m tathaagato aparisuddhaaya parisaaya paatimokkha.m uddiseyya''.
