[03] 21^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V3.0047^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m ^a^T4.0212^ea^. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi {abbhutadhammehi (syaa0 ka0)} samannaagata.m ugga.m gahapati.m vesaalika.m dhaarethaa''ti. idamavoca ^a^P4.0209^ea^ bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi.

[03] atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena uggassa gahapatino vesaalikassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho uggo gahapati vesaaliko yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ugga.m gahapati.m vesaalika.m so bhikkhu etadavoca --

[03] ``a.t.thahi kho tva.m, gahapati, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannaagato bhagavataa byaakato. katame te, gahapati, a.t.tha acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa, yehi tva.m samannaagato bhagavataa byaakato''ti? ``na kho aha.m, bhante, jaanaami -- katamehi a.t.thahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannaagato bhagavataa byaakatoti. api ca, bhante, ye me a.t.tha acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa sa.mvijjanti, ta.m su.nohi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, gahapatii''ti kho so bhikkhu uggassa gahapatino vesaalikassa paccassosi. uggo gahapati vesaaliko etadavoca -- ``yadaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m pa.thama.m duuratova addasa.m; saha dassaneneva me, bhante ^a^M3.0048^ea^, bhagavato citta.m pasiidi. aya.m kho me, bhante, pa.thamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo sa.mvijjati''.

[03] ``so kho aha.m, bhante, pasannacitto bhagavanta.m payirupaasi.m. tassa me bhagavaa anupubbi.m katha.m ^a^V3.0048^ea^ kathesi ^a^T4.0213^ea^, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m; kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m, nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa ma.m bhagavaa a~n~naasi kallacitta.m muducitta.m viniivara.nacitta.m udaggacitta.m pasannacitta.m, atha yaa buddhaana.m ^a^P4.0210^ea^ saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa ta.m pakaasesi -- dukkha.m, samudaya.m, nirodha.m, magga.m. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya; evameva.m kho me tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- `ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma'nti. so kho aha.m, bhante, di.t.thadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogaa.lhadhammo ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusaasane tattheva buddha~nca dhamma~nca sa"ngha~nca sara.na.m agamaasi.m, brahmacariyapa~ncamaani ca sikkhaapadaani samaadiyi.m. aya.m kho me, bhante, dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo sa.mvijjati.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhante, catasso komaariyo pajaapatiyo ahesu.m. atha khvaaha.m, bhante, yena taa pajaapatiyo tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa taa pajaapatiyo etadavaca.m -- `mayaa kho, bhaginiyo, brahmacariyapa~ncamaani sikkhaapadaani samaadinnaani {samaadi.n.naani (sii0 ka0)}. yaa icchati saa idheva bhoge ca bhu~njatu pu~n~naani ca karotu, sakaani vaa ~naatikulaani gacchatu. hoti vaa pana purisaadhippaayo, kassa vo dammii'ti? eva.m vutte saa, bhante, je.t.thaa pajaapati ma.m etadavoca -- `itthannaamassa ma.m, ayyaputta, purisassa dehii'ti. atha kho aha.m, bhante, ta.m purisa.m pakkosaapetvaa vaamena hatthena pajaapati.m gahetvaa ^a^T4.0214^ea^ dakkhi.nena hatthena bhi"ngaara.m gahetvaa tassa purisassa o.nojesi.m. komaari.m kho panaaha.m, bhante, daara.m pariccajanto naabhijaanaami cittassa a~n~nathatta.m. aya.m kho me, bhante, tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo sa.mvijjati.
[03] ``sa.mvijjanti ^a^P4.0211^ea^ kho pana me, bhante, kule bhogaa. te ca kho appa.tivibhattaa siilavantehi kalyaa.nadhammehi. aya.m kho me, bhante, catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo sa.mvijjati.
[03] ``ya.m ^a^M3.0049^ea^ kho panaaha.m, bhante, bhikkhu.m payirupaasaami; sakkacca.myeva payirupaasaami, no asakkacca.m. aya.m kho me, bhante, pa~ncamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo sa.mvijjati.

[03] ``so ^a^V3.0049^ea^ ce, bhante, me aayasmaa dhamma.m deseti; sakkacca.myeva su.nomi, no asakkacca.m. no ce me so aayasmaa dhamma.m deseti, ahamassa dhamma.m desemi. aya.m kho me, bhante cha.t.tho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo sa.mvijjati.

[03] ``anacchariya.m kho pana ma.m, bhante, devataa upasa"nkamitvaa aarocenti -- `svaakkhaato, gahapati, bhagavataa dhammo'ti. eva.m vutte aha.m, bhante, taa devataa eva.m vadaami -- `vadeyyaatha vaa eva.m kho tumhe devataa no vaa vadeyyaatha, atha kho svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo'ti. na kho panaaha.m, bhante, abhijaanaami tatonidaana.m cittassa unnati.m {u.n.nati.m (ka0) dha0 sa0 1121; vibha0 843, 845 passitabba.m} -- `ma.m vaa devataa upasa"nkamanti, aha.m vaa devataahi saddhi.m sallapaamii'ti. aya.m kho me, bhante, sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo sa.mvijjati.

[03] ``yaanimaani, bhante, bhagavataa desitaani pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani, naaha.m tesa.m ki~nci attani appahiina.m samanupassaami. aya.m ^a^T4.0215^ea^ kho me, bhante, a.t.thamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo sa.mvijjati. ime ^a^P4.0212^ea^ kho me, bhante, a.t.tha acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa sa.mvijjanti. na ca kho aha.m jaanaami -- katamehi caaha.m {katamehipaha.m (sii0), katamehipaaha.m (pii0 ka0)} a.t.thahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannaagato bhagavataa byaakato''ti.

[03] atha kho so bhikkhu uggassa gahapatino vesaalikassa nivesane pi.n.dapaata.m gahetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho so bhikkhu pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu yaavatako ahosi uggena gahapatinaa vesaalikena saddhi.m kathaasallaapo, ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, bhikkhu! yathaa ta.m uggo gahapati vesaaliko sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyya, imeheva kho, bhikkhu, a.t.thahi acchariyehi abbhutehi ^a^M3.0050^ea^ dhammehi samannaagato uggo gahapati vesaaliko mayaa byaakato. imehi ca pana, bhikkhu, a.t.thahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannaagata.m ugga.m gahapati.m vesaalika.m dhaarehii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V3.0050^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa vajjiisu viharati hatthigaame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannaagata.m ugga.m gahapati.m hatthigaamaka.m dhaarethaa''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi.

[03] ``na kho aha.m, bhante, jaanaami -- katamehi a.t.thahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannaagato bhagavataa byaakatoti. api ca, bhante, ye me a.t.tha acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa sa.mvijjanti, ta.m su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, gahapatii''ti kho so bhikkhu uggassa gahapatino hatthigaamakassa paccassosi. uggo gahapati hatthigaamako etadavoca -- ``yadaaha.m, bhante, naagavane paricaranto bhagavanta.m pa.thama.m duuratova addasa.m; saha dassaneneva me, bhante, bhagavato citta.m pasiidi, suraamado ca pahiiyi. aya.m kho me, bhante, pa.thamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo sa.mvijjati.

[03] ``ya.m ^a^P4.0215^ea^ kho panaaha.m, bhante, bhikkhu.m payirupaasaami; sakkacca.myeva payirupaasaami, no asakkacca.m. so ce me aayasmaa dhamma.m deseti; sakkacca.myeva su.nomi, no asakkacca.m. no ce me so aayasmaa dhamma.m deseti, ahamassa dhamma.m desemi. aya.m kho me, bhante, pa~ncamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo sa.mvijjati.

[03] ``anacchariya.m ^a^M3.0052^ea^ kho pana, bhante, sa"nghe nimantite devataa upasa"nkamitvaa aarocenti -- `asuko, gahapati, bhikkhu ubhatobhaagavimutto asuko pa~n~naavimutto asuko kaayasakkhii asuko ^a^V3.0052^ea^ di.t.thippatto {di.t.thappatto (ka0)} asuko saddhaavimutto asuko dhammaanusaarii asuko saddhaanusaarii asuko siilavaa kalyaa.nadhammo asuko dussiilo paapadhammo'ti. sa"ngha.m kho panaaha.m, bhante, parivisanto naabhijaanaami eva.m citta.m uppaadento -- `imassa vaa thoka.m demi imassa vaa bahuka'nti. atha khvaaha.m, bhante, samacittova demi. aya.m kho me, bhante, cha.t.tho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo sa.mvijjati.

[03] ``anacchariya.m kho pana ma.m, bhante, devataa upasa"nkamitvaa aarocenti -- `svaakkhaato, gahapati, bhagavataa dhammo'ti. eva.m vutte aha.m, bhante, taa devataa eva.m vademi -- `vadeyyaatha vaa eva.m kho tumhe devataa no vaa vadeyyaatha, atha kho svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo'ti. na kho panaaha.m, bhante, abhijaanaami tatonidaana.m cittassa unnati.m -- `ma.m taa devataa upasa"nkamanti, aha.m vaa ^a^T4.0219^ea^ devataahi saddhi.m sallapaamii'ti. aya.m kho me, bhante, sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo sa.mvijjati.

[03] ``saadhu ^a^M3.0053^ea^ saadhu, bhikkhu! yathaa ta.m uggo gahapati hatthigaamako sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyya, imeheva kho bhikkhu, a.t.thahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannaagato uggo gahapati ^a^V3.0053^ea^ hatthigaamako mayaa byaakato. imehi ca pana, bhikkhu, a.t.thahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannaagata.m ugga.m gahapati.m hatthigaamaka.m dhaarehii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T4.0220^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa aa.laviya.m viharati aggaa.lave cetiye. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``sattahi ^a^P4.0217^ea^, bhikkhave, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannaagata.m hatthaka.m aa.lavaka.m dhaaretha. katamehi sattahi? saddho hi, bhikkhave, hatthako aa.lavako; siilavaa, bhikkhave, hatthako aa.lavako; hiriimaa, bhikkhave, hatthako aa.lavako; ottappii, bhikkhave, hatthako aa.lavako; bahussuto, bhikkhave, hatthako aa.lavako; caagavaa, bhikkhave, hatthako aa.lavako; pa~n~navaa, bhikkhave, hatthako aa.lavako -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannaagata.m hatthaka.m aa.lavaka.m dhaarethaa''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi.

[03] ``sattahi kho tva.m, aavuso, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannaagato bhagavataa byaakato. katamehi sattahi? `saddho, bhikkhave, hatthako aa.lavako; siilavaa...pe0... hirimaa... ottappii... bahussuto... caagavaa... pa~n~navaa, bhikkhave, hatthako aa.lavako'ti. imehi kho tva.m, aavuso, sattahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannaagato bhagavataa byaakato''ti. ``kaccittha, bhante, na koci gihii ahosi odaatavasano''ti? ``na hettha, aavuso ^a^T4.0221^ea^, koci gihii ahosi odaatavasano''ti. ``saadhu, bhante, yadettha na koci gihii ahosi odaatavasano''ti.

[03] ``eva.m vutte, bhante, hatthako ma.m etadavoca -- `kaccittha, bhante, na koci gihii ahosi odaatavasano'ti? `na hettha, aavuso, koci gihii ahosi odaatavasano'ti. `saadhu, bhante, yadettha na koci gihii ahosi odaatavasano'''ti.

[01] ``saadhu saadhu, bhikkhu! appiccho so, bhikkhu, kulaputto ^a^T4.0222^ea^. santeyeva attani kusaladhamme na icchati parehi ~naayamaane {pa~n~naapayamaane (ka0)}. tena hi tva.m, bhikkhu, iminaapi a.t.thamena acchariyena abbhutena dhammena samannaagata.m hatthaka.m aa.lavaka.m dhaarehi, yadida.m appicchataayaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa aa.laviya.m viharati aggaa.lave cetiye. atha kho hatthako aa.lavako pa~ncamattehi upaasakasatehi ^a^P4.0219^ea^ parivuto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho hatthaka.m aa.lavaka.m bhagavaa ^a^M3.0055^ea^ etadavoca -- ``mahatii kho tyaaya.m, hatthaka, parisaa. katha.m pana tva.m, hatthaka, ima.m mahati.m parisa.m sa"nga.nhaasii''ti? ``yaanimaani, bhante, bhagavataa desitaani {a0 ni0 4.32; dii0 ni0 3.313} cattaari sa"ngahavatthuuni, tehaaha.m {tenaaha.m (sii0)} ima.m mahati.m ^a^V3.0055^ea^ parisa.m sa"nga.nhaami. aha.m, bhante, ya.m jaanaami -- `aya.m daanena sa"ngahetabbo'ti, ta.m daanena sa"nga.nhaami; ya.m jaanaami -- `aya.m peyyavajjena sa"ngahetabbo'ti, ta.m peyyavajjena sa"nga.nhaami; ya.m jaanaami -- `aya.m atthacariyaaya sa"ngahetabbo'ti, ta.m atthacariyaaya sa"nga.nhaami; ya.m jaanaami -- `aya.m samaanattataaya sa"ngahetabbo'ti, ta.m samaanattataaya sa"nga.nhaami. sa.mvijjanti kho pana me, bhante, kule bhogaa. daliddassa kho no tathaa sotabba.m ma~n~nantii''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, hatthaka! yoni kho tyaaya.m, hatthaka, mahati.m parisa.m sa"ngahetu.m. ye hi keci, hatthaka, atiitamaddhaana.m mahati.m parisa.m sa"ngahesu.m, sabbe te imeheva catuuhi sa"ngahavatthuuhi mahati.m parisa.m sa"ngahesu.m. yepi hi keci, hatthaka, anaagatamaddhaana.m mahati.m parisa.m sa"nga.nhissanti ^a^T4.0223^ea^, sabbe te imeheva catuuhi sa"ngahavatthuuhi mahati.m parisa.m sa"nga.nhissanti. yepi hi keci, hatthaka, etarahi mahati.m parisa.m sa"nga.nhanti, sabbe te imeheva catuuhi sa"ngahavatthuuhi mahati.m parisa.m sa"nga.nhantii''ti.

[01] atha kho hatthako aa.lavako bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami ^a^P4.0220^ea^. atha kho bhagavaa acirapakkante hatthake aa.lavake bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannaagata.m hatthaka.m aa.lavaka.m dhaaretha. katamehi a.t.thahi? saddho, bhikkhave, hatthako aa.lavako; siilavaa, bhikkhave...pe0... hiriimaa... ottappii... bahussuto... caagavaa... pa~n~navaa, bhikkhave, hatthako aa.lavako; appiccho, bhikkhave, hatthako aa.lavako. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannaagata.m hatthaka.m aa.lavaka.m dhaarethaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. atha kho mahaanaamo sakko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^M3.0056^ea^ bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho mahaanaamo sakko bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, upaasako hotii''ti? ``yato kho, mahaanaama, buddha.m sara.na.m gato hoti, dhamma.m sara.na.m gato hoti, sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gato hoti; ettaavataa kho, mahaanaama, upaasako hotii''ti.

[03] ``kittaavataa ^a^V3.0056^ea^ pana, bhante, upaasako siilavaa hotii''ti? ``yato kho, mahaanaama ^a^T4.0224^ea^, upaasako paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti; ettaavataa kho, mahaanaama, upaasako siilavaa hotii''ti.

[03] ``kittaavataa pana, bhante, upaasako attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no parahitaayaa''ti? ``yato ^a^P4.0221^ea^ kho, mahaanaama, upaasako attanaava saddhaasampanno hoti, no para.m saddhaasampadaaya samaadapeti {samaadaapeti (?)}; attanaava siilasampanno hoti, no para.m siilasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaava caagasampanno hoti, no para.m caagasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaava bhikkhuuna.m dassanakaamo hoti, no para.m bhikkhuuna.m dassane samaadapeti; attanaava saddhamma.m sotukaamo hoti, no para.m saddhammassavane samaadapeti; attanaava sutaana.m dhammaana.m dhaara.najaatiko hoti, no para.m dhammadhaara.naaya samaadapeti; attanaava sutaana.m dhammaana.m atthuupaparikkhitaa hoti, no para.m atthuupaparikkhaaya samaadapeti; attanaava atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno hoti, no para.m dhammaanudhammappa.tipattiyaa samaadapeti. ettaavataa kho, mahaanaama, upaasako attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no parahitaayaa''ti.

[03] ``kittaavataa pana, bhante, upaasako attahitaaya ca pa.tipanno hoti parahitaaya caa''ti? ``yato kho, mahaanaama, upaasako attanaa ca saddhaasampanno hoti, para~nca saddhaasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca siilasampanno ^a^T4.0225^ea^ hoti, para~nca siilasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca caagasampanno hoti, para~nca caagasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca bhikkhuuna.m dassanakaamo hoti, para~nca bhikkhuuna.m dassane samaadapeti; attanaa ca saddhamma.m ^a^M3.0057^ea^ sotukaamo hoti, para~nca saddhammassavane samaadapeti; attanaa ca sutaana.m dhammaana.m dhaara.najaatiko hoti, para~nca dhammadhaara.naaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca sutaana.m dhammaana.m atthuupaparikkhitaa hoti, para~nca atthuupaparikkhaaya samaadapeti, attanaa ca atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya ^a^P4.0222^ea^ dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno hoti, para~nca dhammaanudhammappa.tipattiyaa samaadapeti. ettaavataa kho, mahaanaama, upaasako attahitaaya ca pa.tipanno hoti parahitaaya caa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V3.0057^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati jiivakambavane. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jiivako komaarabhacco bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, upaasako hotii''ti? ``yato kho, jiivaka, buddha.m sara.na.m gato hoti, dhamma.m sara.na.m gato hoti, sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gato hoti; ettaavataa kho jiivaka, upaasako hotii''ti.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thimaani ^a^V3.0058^ea^, bhikkhave, balaani. katamaani a.t.tha? ru.n.nabalaa, bhikkhave, daarakaa, kodhabalaa maatugaamaa, aavudhabalaa coraa, issariyabalaa raajaano, ujjhattibalaa baalaa, nijjhattibalaa pa.n.ditaa, pa.tisa"nkhaanabalaa bahussutaa, khantibalaa sama.nabraahma.naa -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha balaanii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa saariputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m saariputta.m ^a^P4.0224^ea^ bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``kati nu kho, saariputta, khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno balaani, yehi balehi samannaagato khii.naasavo bhikkhu aasavaana.m khaya.m pa.tijaanaati -- `khii.naa me aasavaa'''ti? ``a.t.tha, bhante, khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno balaani, yehi balehi samannaagato khii.naasavo bhikkhu aasavaana.m khaya.m pa.tijaanaati -- `khii.naa me aasavaa'''ti.

[03] ``katamaani a.t.tha? {a0 ni0 10.90; pa.ti0 ma0 2.44} idha, bhante, khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno aniccato sabbe sa"nkhaaraa yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.thaa honti. yampi, bhante, khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno aniccato sabbe sa"nkhaaraa yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.thaa honti, idampi, bhante, khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno bala.m hoti, ya.m bala.m aagamma khii.naasavo bhikkhu aasavaana.m khaya.m pa.tijaanaati -- `khii.naa me aasavaa'''ti.

[03] ``puna ^a^V3.0059^ea^ capara.m, bhante, khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno vivekaninna.m citta.m hoti vivekapo.na.m vivekapabbhaara.m viveka.t.tha.m nekkhammaabhirata.m byantibhuuta.m sabbaso aasava.t.thaaniyehi dhammehi. yampi, bhante, khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno vivekaninna.m citta.m hoti vivekapo.na.m vivekapabbhaara.m viveka.t.tha.m nekkhammaabhirata.m byantibhuuta.m sabbaso aasava.t.thaaniyehi dhammehi, idampi, bhante, khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno bala.m hoti, ya.m bala.m aagamma khii.naasavo bhikkhu aasavaana.m khaya.m pa.tijaanaati -- `khii.naa me aasavaa'''ti.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa bhaggesu viharati su.msumaaragire bhesaka.laavane migadaaye. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa anuruddho cetiisu viharati paaciinava.msadaaye. atha kho aayasmato anuruddhassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``appicchassaaya.m dhammo, naaya.m dhammo mahicchassa; santu.t.thassaaya.m dhammo ^a^P4.0229^ea^, naaya.m dhammo asantu.t.thassa; pavivittassaaya.m dhammo, naaya.m dhammo sa"nga.nikaaraamassa; aaraddhaviiriyassaaya.m dhammo, naaya.m dhammo kusiitassa; upa.t.thitassatissaaya.m ^a^V3.0063^ea^ {upa.t.thitasatissaaya.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} dhammo, naaya.m dhammo mu.t.thassatissa {mu.t.thasatissa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}; samaahitassaaya.m dhammo, naaya.m dhammo asamaahitassa; pa~n~navato aya.m dhammo, naaya.m dhammo duppa~n~nassaa''ti.

[03] atha ^a^M3.0063^ea^ kho bhagavaa aayasmato anuruddhassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya; evameva.m -- bhaggesu su.msumaaragire bhesaka.laavane migadaaye antarahito cetiisu paaciinava.msadaaye aayasmato anuruddhassa sammukhe paaturahosi. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. aayasmaapi kho anuruddho bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m
[4.]0233 nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddha! saadhu kho tva.m, anuruddha, (ya.m ta.m mahaapurisavitakka.m) {satta mahaapurisavitakke (sii0 pii0) dii0 ni0 3.358} vitakkesi -- `appicchassaaya.m dhammo, naaya.m dhammo mahicchassa; santu.t.thassaaya.m dhammo, naaya.m dhammo asantu.t.thassa; pavivittassaaya.m dhammo, naaya.m dhammo sa"nga.nikaaraamassa; aaraddhaviiriyassaaya.m dhammo, naaya.m dhammo kusiitassa; upa.t.thitassatissaaya.m dhammo, naaya.m dhammo mu.t.thassatissa; samaahitassaaya.m dhammo, naaya.m dhammo asamaahitassa; pa~n~navato aya.m dhammo, naaya.m dhammo duppa~n~nassaa'ti. tena hi tva.m, anuruddha, imampi a.t.thama.m mahaapurisavitakka.m vitakkehi -- `nippapa~ncaaraamassaaya.m dhammo nippapa~ncaratino, naaya.m dhammo papa~ncaaraamassa papa~ncaratino'''ti.

[03] ``yato kho tva.m, anuruddha, ime a.t.tha mahaapurisavitakke vitakkessasi, tato tva.m, anuruddha, yaavadeva {yaavade (sa.m0 ni0 2.152)} aaka"nkhissasi, vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi ^a^P4.0230^ea^ savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharissasi.

[03] ``yato kho tva.m, anuruddha, ime a.t.tha mahaapurisavitakke vitakkessasi, tato tva.m, anuruddha, yaavadeva aaka"nkhissasi, vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharissasi.

[03] ``yato kho tva.m, anuruddha, ime a.t.tha mahaapurisavitakke vitakkessasi, tato tva.m, anuruddha ^a^V3.0064^ea^, yaavadeva aaka"nkhissasi, piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharissasi sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedissasi ^a^M3.0064^ea^ ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako ^a^T4.0234^ea^ satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharissasi.

[03] ``yato kho tva.m, anuruddha, ime a.t.tha mahaapurisavitakke vitakkessasi, tato tva.m, anuruddha, yaavadeva aaka"nkhissasi, sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharissasi.

[03] ``yato kho tva.m, anuruddha, ime ca a.t.tha mahaapurisavitakke vitakkessasi, imesa~nca catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii bhavissasi akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, tato tuyha.m, anuruddha, seyyathaapi naama gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa naanaarattaana.m dussaana.m dussakara.n.dako puuro; evameva.m te pa.msukuulaciivara.m khaayissati santu.t.thassa viharato ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya okkamanaaya nibbaanassa.

[03] ``yato ^a^P4.0231^ea^ kho tva.m, anuruddha, ime ca a.t.tha mahaapurisavitakke vitakkessasi, imesa~nca catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii bhavissasi akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, tato tuyha.m, anuruddha, seyyathaapi naama gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa saaliina.m odano vicitakaa.lako anekasuupo anekabya~njano; evameva.m te pi.n.diyaalopabhojana.m khaayissati santu.t.thassa viharato ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya okkamanaaya nibbaanassa.

[03] ``yato kho tva.m, anuruddha, ime ca a.t.tha mahaapurisavitakke vitakkessasi, imesa~nca catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii bhavissasi akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, tato tuyha.m, anuruddha, seyyathaapi ^a^T4.0235^ea^ naama gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa kuu.taagaara.m ullittaavalitta.m nivaata.m phusitagga.la.m pihitavaatapaana.m; evameva.m te rukkhamuulasenaasana.m khaayissati santu.t.thassa viharato ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya okkamanaaya nibbaanassa.

[03] ``yato ^a^V3.0065^ea^ kho tva.m, anuruddha, ime ca a.t.tha mahaapurisavitakke vitakkessasi, imesa~nca catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii bhavissasi akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, tato tuyha.m, anuruddha ^a^M3.0065^ea^, seyyathaapi naama gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa palla"nko gonakatthato pa.tikatthato pa.talikatthato kadalimigapavarapaccatthara.no {kaadali... paccatthara.no (sii0)} sauttaracchado ubhatolohitakuupadhaano; evameva.m te ti.nasanthaarakasayanaasana.m khaayissati santu.t.thassa viharato ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya okkamanaaya nibbaanassa.

[03] ``yato ^a^P4.0232^ea^ kho tva.m, anuruddha, ime ca a.t.tha mahaapurisavitakke vitakkessasi, imesa~nca catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii bhavissasi akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, tato tuyha.m, anuruddha, seyyathaapi naama gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa naanaabhesajjaani, seyyathida.m -- sappi navaniita.m tela.m madhu phaa.nita.m; evameva.m te puutimuttabhesajja.m khaayissati santu.t.thassa viharato ratiyaa aparitassaaya phaasuvihaaraaya okkamanaaya nibbaanassa. tena hi tva.m, anuruddha, aayatikampi vassaavaasa.m idheva cetiisu paaciinava.msadaaye vihareyyaasii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa anuruddho bhagavato paccassosi.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m iminaa ovaadena ovaditvaa -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa ^a^T4.0236^ea^ puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva.m -- cetiisu paaciinava.msadaaye antarahito bhaggesu su.msumaaragire bhesaka.laavane migadaaye paaturahosiiti. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``a.t.tha kho, bhikkhave, mahaapurisavitakke desessaami, ta.m su.naatha...pe0... katame ca, bhikkhave, a.t.tha mahaapurisavitakkaa? appicchassaaya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo mahicchassa; santu.t.thassaaya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo asantu.t.thassa; pavivittassaaya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo sa"nga.nikaaraamassa; aaraddhaviiriyassaaya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo kusiitassa; upa.t.thitassatissaaya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo mu.t.thassatissa; samaahitassaaya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo asamaahitassa; pa~n~navato aya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m ^a^P4.0233^ea^ dhammo duppa~n~nassa; nippapa~ncaaraamassaaya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo nippapa~ncaratino, naaya.m dhammo papa~ncaaraamassa papa~ncaratino''.

[03] ```appicchassaaya.m ^a^M3.0066^ea^ ^a^V3.0066^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo mahicchassaa'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appiccho samaano `appicchoti ma.m jaaneyyu'nti na icchati, santu.t.tho samaano `santu.t.thoti ma.m jaaneyyu'nti na icchati, pavivitto samaano `pavivittoti ma.m jaaneyyu'nti na icchati, aaraddhaviiriyo samaano `aaraddhaviiriyoti ma.m jaaneyyu'nti na icchati, upa.t.thitassati samaano `upa.t.thitassatiiti ma.m jaaneyyu'nti na icchati, samaahito samaano `samaahitoti ^a^T4.0237^ea^ ma.m jaaneyyu'nti na icchati, pa~n~navaa samaano `pa~n~navaati ma.m jaaneyyu'nti na icchati, nippapa~ncaaraamo samaano `nippapa~ncaaraamoti ma.m jaaneyyu'nti na icchati. `appicchassaaya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo mahicchassaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```santu.t.thassaaya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo asantu.t.thassaa'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m, ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti itariitaraciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena. `santu.t.thassaaya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo asantu.t.thassaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```pavivittassaaya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo sa"nga.nikaaraamassaa'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m, ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato bhavanti upasa"nkamitaaro bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo raajaano raajamahaamattaa titthiyaa titthiyasaavakaa. tatra bhikkhu vivekaninnena cittena vivekapo.nena vivekapabbhaarena viveka.t.thena nekkhammaabhiratena a~n~nadatthu uyyojanikapa.tisa.myutta.myeva katha.m kattaa {pavattaa (ka0)} hoti. `pavivittassaaya.m ^a^P4.0234^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo sa"nga.nikaaraamassaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```aaraddhaviiriyassaaya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo kusiitassaa'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m, ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya ^a^T4.0238^ea^ thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. `aaraddhaviiriyassaaya.m ^a^M3.0067^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo kusiitassaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```upa.t.thitassatissaaya.m ^a^V3.0067^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo mu.t.thassatissaa'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satimaa hoti paramena satinepakkena samannaagato, cirakatampi cirabhaasitampi saritaa anussaritaa. `upa.t.thitassatissaaya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo, mu.t.thassatissaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```samaahitassaaya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo asamaahitassaa'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. `samaahitassaaya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo asamaahitassaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```pa~n~navato aya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo duppa~n~nassaa'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~n~navaa hoti udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. `pa~n~navato aya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo duppa~n~nassaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```nippapa~ncaaraamassaaya.m ^a^P4.0235^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammo nippapa~ncaratino, naaya.m dhammo papa~ncaaraamassa papa~ncaratino'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m ^a^T4.0239^ea^ pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno papa~ncanirodhe citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. `nippapa~ncaaraamassaaya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, nippapa~ncaratino, naaya.m dhammo papa~ncaaraamassa papa~ncaratino'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa anuruddho aayatikampi vassaavaasa.m tattheva cetiisu paaciinava.msadaaye vihaasi. atha kho aayasmaa anuruddho eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa anuruddho arahata.m ^a^M3.0068^ea^ ahosiiti. atha kho aayasmaa anuruddho arahattappatto taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.tha"ngasamannaagate ^a^V3.0070^ea^, bhikkhave, khette biija.m vutta.m na mahapphala.m hoti na mahassaada.m na phaatiseyya.m {na phaatiseyyanti (sii0 syaa0 ka0), na phaatiseyyaa (katthaci)}. katha.m a.t.tha"ngasamannaagate? idha, bhikkhave, khetta.m unnaamaninnaami ca hoti, paasaa.nasakkharika~nca hoti, uusara~nca hoti, na ca gambhiirasita.m hoti, na aayasampanna.m hoti, na apaayasampanna.m hoti, na maatikaasampanna.m hoti, na mariyaadasampanna.m hoti. eva.m a.t.tha"ngasamannaagate, bhikkhave, khette biija.m vutta.m na mahapphala.m hoti na mahassaada.m na phaatiseyya.m.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha"ngasamannaagatesu sama.nabraahma.nesu daana.m dinna.m na mahapphala.m hoti na mahaanisa.msa.m na mahaajutika.m na mahaavipphaara.m. katha.m a.t.tha"ngasamannaagatesu? idha, bhikkhave, sama.nabraahma.naa micchaadi.t.thikaa honti, micchaasa"nkappaa, micchaavaacaa, micchaakammantaa, micchaaaajiivaa, micchaavaayaamaa, micchaasatino, micchaasamaadhino. eva.m a.t.tha"ngasamannaagatesu, bhikkhave, sama.nabraahma.nesu daana.m dinna.m na mahapphala.m hoti na mahaanisa.msa.m na mahaajutika.m na mahaavipphaara.m.

[03] ``a.t.tha"ngasamannaagate, bhikkhave, khette biija.m vutta.m mahapphala.m hoti mahassaada.m ^a^T4.0242^ea^ phaatiseyya.m. katha.m a.t.tha"ngasamannaagate? idha, bhikkhave, khetta.m anunnaamaaninnaami ca hoti, apaasaa.nasakkharika~nca hoti, anuusara~nca hoti, gambhiirasita.m ^a^P4.0238^ea^ hoti, aayasampanna.m hoti, apaayasampanna.m hoti, maatikaasampanna.m ^a^M3.0070^ea^ hoti, mariyaadasampanna.m hoti. eva.m a.t.tha"ngasamannaagate, bhikkhave, khette biija.m vutta.m mahapphala.m hoti mahassaada.m phaatiseyya.m.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha"ngasamannaagatesu sama.nabraahma.nesu daana.m dinna.m mahapphala.m hoti mahaanisa.msa.m mahaajutika.m mahaavipphaara.m. katha.m a.t.tha"ngasamannaagatesu? idha, bhikkhave, sama.nabraahma.naa sammaadi.t.thikaa honti, sammaasa"nkappaa, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammantaa, sammaaaajiivaa, sammaavaayaamaa, sammaasatino, sammaasamaadhino. eva.m a.t.tha"ngasamannaagatesu, bhikkhave, sama.nabraahma.nesu daana.m dinna.m mahapphala.m hoti mahaanisa.msa.m mahaajutika.m mahaavipphaara''nti.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ {dii0 ni0 3.337} ``a.t.thimaa, bhikkhave, daanuupapattiyo. katamaa a.t.tha? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco daana.m deti sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa anna.m paana.m vattha.m yaana.m ^a^M3.0071^ea^ maalaagandhavilepana.m seyyaavasathapadiipeyya.m. so ya.m deti ta.m paccaasiisati {paccaasi.msati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. so passati khattiyamahaasaale vaa braahma.namahaasaale vaa gahapatimahaasaale vaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappite sama"ngiibhuute paricaarayamaane. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa khattiyamahaasaalaana.m ^a^V3.0072^ea^ vaa braahma.namahaasaalaana.m vaa gahapatimahaasaalaana.m vaa sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti! so ta.m citta.m dahati, ta.m citta.m adhi.t.thaati, ta.m citta.m bhaaveti. tassa ta.m citta.m hiine vimutta.m {hiinedhimutta.m (syaa0 pii0) vimuttanti adhimutta.m, vimuttanti vaa vissa.t.tha.m (.tiikaasa.mva.n.nanaa)}, uttari abhaavita.m, tatruupapattiyaa sa.mvattati. kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa khattiyamahaasaalaana.m vaa braahma.namahaasaalaana.m vaa gahapatimahaasaalaana.m vaa sahabyata.m upapajjati. ta~nca kho siilavato vadaami, no dussiilassa. ijjhati, bhikkhave, siilavato cetopa.nidhi visuddhattaa.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, pu~n~nakiriyavatthuuni. katamaani tii.ni? daanamaya.m pu~n~nakiriyavatthu {pu~n~nakiriyavatthu.m (sii0 pii0) evamuparipi}, siilamaya.m pu~n~nakiriyavatthu, bhaavanaamaya.m pu~n~nakiriyavatthu. idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa daanamaya.m pu~n~nakiriyavatthu paritta.m kata.m hoti, siilamaya.m pu~n~nakiriyavatthu paritta.m kata.m hoti, bhaavanaamaya.m pu~n~nakiriyavatthu.m {pu~n~nakiriyavatthu (syaa0)} naabhisambhoti. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa manussadobhagya.m upapajjati.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M3.0079^ea^ ^a^V3.0080^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``a.t.tha"ngasamannaagato, bhikkhave, uposatho upavuttho mahapphalo hoti mahaanisa.mso mahaajutiko mahaavipphaaro. katha.m upavuttho ca, bhikkhave, a.t.tha"ngasamannaagato uposatho mahapphalo hoti mahaanisa.mso mahaajutiko mahaavipphaaro? idha ^a^P4.0249^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yaavajiiva.m arahanto paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirataa nihitada.n.daa nihitasatthaa lajjii dayaapannaa, sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampino viharanti. aha.m pajja ima~nca ratti.m ima~nca divasa.m paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato nihitada.n.do nihitasattho lajjii dayaapanno, sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii ^a^T4.0254^ea^ viharaami. iminaapa"ngena {iminaapi a"ngena (sii0 pii0) a0 ni0 3.71} arahata.m anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatii'ti. iminaa pa.thamena a"ngena samannaagato hoti.

[03] ```yaavajiiva.m arahanto adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirataa dinnaadaayii dinnapaa.tika"nkhii, athenena sucibhuutena attanaa viharanti. aha.m pajja ima~nca ratti.m ima~nca divasa.m adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato dinnaadaayii dinnapaa.tika"nkhii, athenena sucibhuutena attanaa viharaami. iminaapa"ngena arahata.m anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatii'ti. iminaa dutiyena a"ngena samannaagato hoti.

[03] ```yaavajiiva.m arahanto abrahmacariya.m pahaaya brahmacaarino aaraacaarino virataa methunaa gaamadhammaa. aha.m pajja ima~nca ratti.m ima~nca divasa.m abrahmacariya.m pahaaya brahmacaarii aaraacaarii {anaacaarii (ka0)} virato ^a^V3.0081^ea^ methunaa gaamadhammaa. iminaapa"ngena arahata.m anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatii'ti. iminaa tatiyena a"ngena samannaagato hoti.

[03] ```yaavajiiva.m ^a^M3.0080^ea^ arahanto musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirataa saccavaadino saccasandhaa thetaa paccayikaa avisa.mvaadako lokassa. aha.m pajja ima~nca ratti.m ima~nca divasa.m musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato saccavaadii ^a^P4.0250^ea^ saccasandho theto paccayiko avisa.mvaadako lokassa. iminaapa"ngena arahata.m anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatii'ti. iminaa catutthena a"ngena samannaagato hoti.

[03] ```yaavajiiva.m arahanto suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m pahaaya suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirataa. aha.m ^a^T4.0255^ea^ pajja ima~nca ratti.m ima~nca divasa.m suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m pahaaya suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato. iminaapa"ngena arahata.m anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatii'ti. iminaa pa~ncamena a"ngena samannaagato hoti.

[03] ```yaavajiiva.m arahanto ekabhattikaa rattuuparataa virataa vikaalabhojanaa. aha.m pajja ima~nca ratti.m ima~nca divasa.m ekabhattiko rattuuparato virato vikaalabhojanaa. iminaapa"ngena arahata.m anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatii'ti. iminaa cha.t.thena a"ngena samannaagato hoti.

[03] ```yaavajiiva.m arahanto naccagiitavaaditavisuukadassanamaalaagandhavilepanadhaara.nama.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaana.m pahaaya naccagiitavaaditavisuukadassanamaalaagandhavilepanadhaara.nama.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaanaa pa.tivirataa. aha.m pajja ima~nca ratti.m ima~nca divasa.m naccagiitavaaditavisuukadassanamaalaagandhavilepanadhaara.nama.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaana.m pahaaya naccagiitavaaditavisuukadassanamaalaagandhavilepanadhaara.nama.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato. iminaapa"ngena arahata.m anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatii'ti. iminaa sattamena a"ngena samannaagato hoti.

[01] ```yaavajiiva.m arahanto uccaasayanamahaasayana.m pahaaya uccaasayanamahaasayanaa pa.tivirataa niicaseyya.m kappenti -- ma~ncake vaa ti.nasanthaarake vaa. aha.m pajja ima~nca ratti.m ima~nca divasa.m ^a^V3.0082^ea^ uccaasayanamahaasayana.m pahaaya uccaasayanamahaasayanaa pa.tivirato niicaseyya.m kappemi -- ma~ncake vaa ti.nasanthaarake vaa. iminaapa"ngena arahata.m anukaromi ^a^P4.0251^ea^, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatii'ti. iminaa a.t.thamena a"ngena samannaagato hoti ^a^M3.0081^ea^. eva.m upavuttho kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha"ngasamannaagato uposatho mahapphalo hoti mahaanisa.mso mahaajutiko mahaavipphaaro''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] ``kiivamahapphalo hoti kiivamahaanisa.mso kiivamahaajutiko kiivamahaavipphaaro? seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, yo imesa.m so.lasanna.m mahaajanapadaana.m pahuutarattaratanaana.m ^a^T4.0257^ea^ {pahuutasattaratanaana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) a0 ni0 3.71 paa.liyaa .tiikaaya.m dassitapaa.liyeva. tada.t.thakathaapi passitabbaa} issariyaadhipacca.m rajja.m kaareyya, seyyathida.m -- a"ngaana.m magadhaana.m kaasiina.m kosalaana.m vajjiina.m mallaana.m cetiina.m va"ngaana.m kuruuna.m pa~ncaalaana.m macchaana.m {majjaana.m (ka0)} suurasenaana.m assakaana.m avantiina.m gandhaaraana.m kambojaana.m, a.t.tha"ngasamannaagatassa ^a^M3.0082^ea^ ^a^V3.0083^ea^ uposathassa eta.m {eka.m (ka0)} kala.m naagghati so.lasi.m. ta.m kissa hetu? kapa.na.m, bhikkhave, maanusaka.m rajja.m dibba.m sukha.m upanidhaaya.

[03] ``yaani, bhikkhave, maanusakaani pa~n~naasa vassaani, caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m eso eko rattindivo {rattidivo (ka0)}. taaya rattiyaa ti.msarattiyo maaso. tena maasena dvaadasamaasiyo sa.mvaccharo. tena sa.mvaccharena dibbaani pa~nca vassasataani caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, bhikkhave, vijjati ya.m idhekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m uposatha.m upavasitvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ida.m kho paneta.m, bhikkhave, sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `kapa.na.m maanusaka.m rajja.m dibba.m sukha.m upanidhaaya'''.

[03] ``yaani, bhikkhave, maanusakaani vassasataani, taavati.msaana.m devaana.m eso eko rattindivo. taaya rattiyaa ti.msarattiyo maaso. tena maasena dvaadasamaasiyo sa.mvaccharo. tena sa.mvaccharena dibba.m vassasahassa.m taavati.msaana.m devaana.m ^a^P4.0253^ea^ aayuppamaa.na.m. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, bhikkhave, vijjati ya.m idhekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m uposatha.m upavasitvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa taavati.msaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ida.m kho paneta.m, bhikkhave, sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `kapa.na.m ^a^T4.0258^ea^ maanusaka.m rajja.m dibba.m sukha.m upanidhaaya'''.

[03] ``yaani, bhikkhave, maanusakaani dve vassasataani, yaamaana.m devaana.m eso eko rattindivo. taaya rattiyaa ti.msarattiyo maaso. tena maasena dvaadasamaasiyo sa.mvaccharo. tena sa.mvaccharena dibbaani dve vassasahassaani yaamaana.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, bhikkhave, vijjati ya.m idhekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m uposatha.m upavasitvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa yaamaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ida.m kho paneta.m, bhikkhave, sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `kapa.na.m maanusaka.m rajja.m dibba.m sukha.m upanidhaaya'''.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``pa.tiggahitaa, bhante, mahaapajaapatiyaa gotamiyaa a.t.tha garudhammaa yaavajiiva.m anatikkamaniiyaa''ti.

[03] ``sace, aananda, naalabhissa maatugaamo tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajja.m, cira.t.thitika.m, aananda, brahmacariya.m abhavissa, vassasahassameva saddhammo ti.t.theyya. yato ca kho, aananda, maatugaamo tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito, na daani, aananda, brahmacariya.m cira.t.thitika.m bhavissati. pa~nceva daani, aananda, vassasataani saddhammo .thassati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, aananda, yaani kaanici kulaani bahutthikaani {bahukitthikaani (sii0 pii0), bahuitthikaani (syaa0)} appapurisakaani, taani suppadha.msiyaani honti corehi kumbhatthenakehi; evameva.m kho, aananda, yasmi.m dhammavinaye labhati maatugaamo agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajja.m, na ta.m brahmacariya.m cira.t.thitika.m hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^T4.0287^ea^, aananda, sampanne saalikkhette seta.t.thikaa ^a^P4.0279^ea^ naama rogajaati nipatati, eva.m ta.m saalikkhetta.m na cira.t.thitika.m hoti; evameva.m kho, aananda, yasmi.m dhammavinaye labhati maatugaamo agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajja.m, na ta.m brahmacariya.m cira.t.thitika.m hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0108^ea^, aananda, sampanne ucchukkhette ma~nji.t.thikaa {ma~nje.t.thikaa (sii0 syaa0)} naama rogajaati nipatati, eva.m ta.m ucchukkhetta.m na cira.t.thitika.m hoti; evameva.m kho, aananda, yasmi.m dhammavinaye labhati maatugaamo agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajja.m, na ta.m brahmacariya.m cira.t.thitika.m hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M3.0106^ea^, aananda, puriso mahato ta.laakassa pa.tikacceva {pa.tigacceva (sii0 pii0)} aa.li.m bandheyya yaavadeva udakassa anatikkamanaaya; evameva.m kho, aananda, mayaa pa.tikacceva bhikkhuniina.m a.t.tha garudhammaa pa~n~nattaa yaavajiiva.m anatikkamaniiyaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``katihi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhikkhunovaadako sammannitabbo''ti?

[03] {paaci0 147} ``a.t.thahi kho, aananda, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhikkhunovaadako sammannitabbo. katamehi a.t.thahi? idhaananda, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; ubhayaani kho panassa paatimokkhaani vitthaarena svaagataani ^a^T4.0288^ea^ honti suvibhattaani suppavattiini suvinicchitaani suttaso anubya~njanaso; kalyaa.navaaco hoti kalyaa.navaakkara.no, poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya {visa.t.thaaya (ka0)} anelaga.laaya {ane.laga.laaya (sii0 ka0)} atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa; pa.tibalo hoti ^a^P4.0280^ea^ bhikkhunisa"nghassa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetu.m samaadapetu.m samuttejetu.m sampaha.msetu.m; yebhuyyena bhikkhuniina.m piyo hoti manaapo; na kho paneta.m bhagavanta.m uddissa pabbajitaaya kaasaayavatthanivasanaaya garudhamma.m ajjhaapannapubbo hoti; viisativasso vaa hoti atirekaviisativasso vaa. imehi kho, aananda, a.t.thahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhikkhunovaadako sammannitabbo''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 406} eka.m ^a^V3.0109^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho mahaapajaapatii gotamii yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa mahaapajaapatii gotamii bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``saadhu ^a^M3.0107^ea^ me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu, yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa ekaa vuupaka.t.thaa appamattaa aataapinii pahitattaa vihareyya''nti. ``ye kho tva.m, gotami, dhamme jaaneyyaasi -- `ime dhammaa saraagaaya sa.mvattanti, no viraagaaya; sa.myogaaya sa.mvattanti, no visa.myogaaya; aacayaaya sa.mvattanti, no apacayaaya; mahicchataaya sa.mvattanti, no appicchataaya; asantu.t.thiyaa sa.mvattanti, no santu.t.thiyaa; sa"nga.nikaaya sa.mvattanti, no pavivekaaya; kosajjaaya sa.mvattanti, no viiriyaarambhaaya; dubbharataaya sa.mvattanti, no subharataayaa'ti, eka.msena, gotami, dhaareyyaasi -- `neso dhammo, neso vinayo, neta.m satthusaasana'''nti ^a^T4.0289^ea^.

[03] ``ye ca kho tva.m, gotami, dhamme jaaneyyaasi -- `ime dhammaa viraagaaya sa.mvattanti, no saraagaaya; visa.myogaaya sa.mvattanti, no sa.myogaaya; apacayaaya sa.mvattanti, no aacayaaya; appicchataaya sa.mvattanti, no mahicchataaya; santu.t.thiyaa sa.mvattanti, no asantu.t.thiyaa; pavivekaaya sa.mvattanti, no sa"nga.nikaaya ^a^P4.0281^ea^; viiriyaarambhaaya sa.mvattanti, no kosajjaaya; subharataaya sa.mvattanti, no dubbharataayaa'ti, eka.msena, gotami, dhaareyyaasi -- `eso dhammo, eso vinayo, eta.m satthusaasana'''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa koliyesu viharati kakkarapatta.m naama koliyaana.m nigamo. atha kho diighajaa.nu koliyaputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho diighajaa.nu koliyaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``maya.m, bhante, gihii kaamabhogino {kaamabhogii (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} puttasambaadhasayana.m ajjhaavasaama, kaasikacandana.m paccanubhoma ^a^V3.0110^ea^, maalaagandhavilepana.m dhaarayaama, jaataruuparajata.m saadayaama. tesa.m no, bhante, bhagavaa amhaaka.m tathaa dhamma.m desetu ye amhaaka.m assu dhammaa di.t.thadhammahitaaya di.t.thadhammasukhaaya, samparaayahitaaya samparaayasukhaayaa''ti.

[03] ``cattaarome, byagghapajja, dhammaa kulaputtassa di.t.thadhammahitaaya sa.mvattanti di.t.thadhammasukhaaya. katame cattaaro? u.t.thaanasampadaa, aarakkhasampadaa, kalyaa.namittataa, samajiivitaa {samajiivikataa (sii0) a0 ni0 8.75}. katamaa ^a^T4.0290^ea^ ca, byagghapajja, u.t.thaanasampadaa? idha, byagghapajja, kulaputto ^a^M3.0108^ea^ yena kamma.t.thaanena jiivika.m {jiivita.m (ka0)} kappeti -- yadi kasiyaa, yadi va.nijjaaya, yadi gorakkhena, yadi issattena {issatthena (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, yadi raajaporisena, yadi sippa~n~natarena -- tattha dakkho hoti analaso, tatrupaayaaya viima.msaaya samannaagato, ala.m kaatu.m ala.m sa.mvidhaatu.m. aya.m vuccati, byagghapajja, u.t.thaanasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, byagghapajja, aarakkhasampadaa? idha, byagghapajja, kulaputtassa bhogaa honti u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigataa ^a^P4.0282^ea^ baahaabalaparicitaa, sedaavakkhittaa, dhammikaa dhammaladdhaa. te aarakkhena guttiyaa sampaadeti -- `kinti me ime bhoge neva raajaano hareyyu.m, na coraa hareyyu.m, na aggi .daheyya, na udaka.m vaheyya, na appiyaa daayaadaa hareyyu'nti! aya.m vuccati, byagghapajja, aarakkhasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, byagghapajja, kalyaa.namittataa? idha, byagghapajja, kulaputto yasmi.m gaame vaa nigame vaa pa.tivasati, tattha ye te honti -- gahapatii vaa gahapatiputtaa vaa daharaa vaa vuddhasiilino, vuddhaa vaa vuddhasiilino, saddhaasampannaa, siilasampannaa, caagasampannaa, pa~n~naasampannaa -- tehi saddhi.m santi.t.thati sallapati saakaccha.m samaapajjati; yathaaruupaana.m saddhaasampannaana.m saddhaasampada.m anusikkhati, yathaaruupaana.m siilasampannaana.m siilasampada.m anusikkhati, yathaaruupaana.m caagasampannaana.m caagasampada.m anusikkhati, yathaaruupaana.m pa~n~naasampannaana.m pa~n~naasampada.m anusikkhati. aya.m vuccati, byagghapajja, kalyaa.namittataa.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^T4.0291^ea^ ca, byagghapajja, samajiivitaa? idha, byagghapajja, kulaputto aaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa, vaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa, sama.m jiivika.m {samajiivika.m (syaa0), samajiivita.m (ka0)} kappeti naaccogaa.lha.m naatihiina.m -- `eva.m me aayo vaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, na ca me vayo aaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassatii'ti. seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0111^ea^, byagghapajja, tulaadhaaro vaa tulaadhaarantevaasii vaa tula.m paggahetvaa jaanaati -- `ettakena vaa onata.m {o.nata.m (ka0)}, ettakena vaa unnata'nti {u.n.natanti (ka0)}; evameva.m kho, byagghapajja, kulaputto aaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa, vaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa, sama.m jiivika.m kappeti naaccogaa.lha.m naatihiina.m -- `eva.m me aayo vaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassati ^a^P4.0283^ea^, na ca me vayo aaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassatii'ti. sacaaya.m, byagghapajja, kulaputto appaayo ^a^M3.0109^ea^ samaano u.laara.m jiivika.m {jiivita.m (ka0)} kappeti, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `udumbarakhaadiivaaya.m {udumbarakhaadika.m vaaya.m (sii0 pii0), udumbarakhaadaka.m caaya.m (syaa0)} kulaputto bhoge khaadatii'ti. sace panaaya.m, byagghapajja, kulaputto mahaayo samaano kasira.m jiivika.m {jiivita.m (ka0)} kappeti, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `aje.t.thamara.na.mvaaya.m {ajaddhumaarika.m vaaya.m (sii0 pii0), addhamaaraka.m caaya.m (syaa0), ettha jaddhuuti asana.m = bhattabhu~njana.m, tasmaa ajaddhumaarikanti anasanamara.nanti vutta.m hoti. ma0 ni0 1.379 adholipiyaa ``ajaddhuka''nti pada.m dassita.m} kulaputto marissatii'ti. yato ca khoya.m, byagghapajja, kulaputto aaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa, vaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa, sama.m jiivika.m kappeti naaccogaa.lha.m naatihiina.m -- `eva.m me aayo vaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, na ca me vayo aaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassatii'ti. aya.m vuccati, byagghapajja, samajiivitaa.

[03] ``eva.m samuppannaana.m, byagghapajja, bhogaana.m cattaari apaayamukhaani honti -- itthidhutto, suraadhutto, akkhadhutto, paapamitto paapasahaayo paapasampava"nko. seyyathaapi, byagghapajja, mahato ta.laakassa cattaari ceva ^a^T4.0292^ea^ aayamukhaani, cattaari ca apaayamukhaani. tassa puriso yaani ceva aayamukhaani taani pidaheyya, yaani ca apaayamukhaani taani vivareyya; devo ca na sammaa dhaara.m anuppaveccheyya. eva~nhi tassa, byagghapajja, mahato ta.laakassa parihaaniyeva paa.tika"nkhaa, no vuddhi; evameva.m, byagghapajja, eva.m samuppannaana.m bhogaana.m cattaari apaayamukhaani honti -- itthidhutto, suraadhutto, akkhadhutto, paapamitto paapasahaayo paapasampava"nko.

[03] ``eva.m samuppannaana.m, byagghapajja, bhogaana.m cattaari aayamukhaani honti -- na itthidhutto, na suraadhutto, na akkhadhutto ^a^P4.0284^ea^, kalyaa.namitto kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko. seyyathaapi, byagghapajja, mahato ta.laakassa cattaari ceva aayamukhaani, cattaari ca apaayamukhaani. tassa puriso yaani ceva aayamukhaani taani vivareyya, yaani ca apaayamukhaani taani pidaheyya; devo ca sammaa dhaara.m anuppaveccheyya. eva~nhi tassa, byagghapajja, mahato ta.laakassa vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani; evameva.m kho, byagghapajja, eva.m samuppannaana.m bhogaana.m cattaari aayamukhaani honti -- na itthidhutto ^a^M3.0110^ea^, na suraadhutto, na akkhadhutto, kalyaa.namitto kalyaa.nasahaayo ^a^V3.0112^ea^ kalyaa.nasampava"nko. ime kho, byagghapajja, cattaaro dhammaa kulaputtassa di.t.thadhammahitaaya sa.mvattanti di.t.thadhammasukhaaya.

[03] ``cattaarome, byagghapajja, dhammaa kulaputtassa samparaayahitaaya sa.mvattanti samparaayasukhaaya. katame cattaaro? saddhaasampadaa, siilasampadaa ^a^T4.0293^ea^, caagasampadaa, pa~n~naasampadaa. katamaa ca, byagghapajja, saddhaasampadaa? idha, byagghapajja, kulaputto saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. aya.m vuccati, byagghapajja, saddhaasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, byagghapajja, siilasampadaa? idha, byagghapajja, kulaputto paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti...pe0... suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti. aya.m vuccati, byagghapajja, siilasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, byagghapajja, caagasampadaa? idha, byagghapajja, kulaputto vigatamalamaccherena cetasaa agaara.m ajjhaavasati muttacaago payatapaa.ni vossaggarato yaacayogo daanasa.mvibhaagarato. aya.m vuccati, byagghapajja, caagasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, byagghapajja, pa~n~naasampadaa? idha ^a^P4.0285^ea^, byagghapajja, kulaputto pa~n~navaa hoti, udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. aya.m vuccati, byagghapajja, pa~n~naasampadaa. ime kho, byagghapajja, cattaaro dhammaa kulaputtassa samparaayahitaaya sa.mvattanti samparaayasukhaayaa''ti.
[21] ``u.t.thaataa kammadheyyesu, appamatto vidhaanavaa.
[22] sama.m kappeti jiivika.m {jiivita.m (ka0)}, sambhata.m anurakkhati..
[21] ``saddho siilena sampanno, vada~n~nuu viitamaccharo.
[22] nicca.m ^a^T4.0294^ea^ magga.m visodheti, sotthaana.m samparaayika.m..
[21] ``iccete ^a^V3.0113^ea^ a.t.tha dhammaa ca, saddhassa gharamesino.
[22] akkhaataa saccanaamena, ubhayattha sukhaavahaa..
[21] ``di.t.thadhammahitatthaaya, samparaayasukhaaya ca.
[22] evameta.m gaha.t.thaana.m, caago pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhatii''ti.. catuttha.m.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M3.0111^ea^ kho ujjayo braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho ujjayo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``maya.m, bho gotama, pavaasa.m gantukaamaa. tesa.m no bhava.m gotamo amhaaka.m tathaa dhamma.m desetu -- ye amhaaka.m assu dhammaa di.t.thadhammahitaaya, di.t.thadhammasukhaaya, samparaayahitaaya, samparaayasukhaayaa''ti.

[03] ``cattaarome, braahma.na, dhammaa kulaputtassa di.t.thadhammahitaaya sa.mvattanti, di.t.thadhammasukhaaya. katame cattaaro? u.t.thaanasampadaa ^a^P4.0286^ea^, aarakkhasampadaa, kalyaa.namittataa, samajiivitaa. katamaa ca, braahma.na, u.t.thaanasampadaa? idha, braahma.na, kulaputto yena kamma.t.thaanena jiivika.m kappeti -- yadi kasiyaa, yadi va.nijjaaya, yadi gorakkhena, yadi issattena, yadi raajaporisena, yadi sippa~n~natarena -- tattha dakkho hoti analaso, tatrupaayaaya viima.msaaya samannaagato, ala.m kaatu.m ala.m sa.mvidhaatu.m. aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, u.t.thaanasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, braahma.na, aarakkhasampadaa? idha, braahma.na, kulaputtassa ^a^T4.0295^ea^ bhogaa honti u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigataa, baahaabalaparicitaa, sedaavakkhittaa, dhammikaa dhammaladdhaa. te aarakkhena guttiyaa sampaadeti -- `kinti me ime bhoge neva raajaano hareyyu.m, na coraa hareyyu.m, na aggi .daheyya, na udaka.m vaheyya, na appiyaa daayaadaa hareyyu'nti. aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, aarakkhasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, braahma.na, kalyaa.namittataa? idha, braahma.na, kulaputto yasmi.m gaame vaa nigame ^a^V3.0114^ea^ vaa pa.tivasati tatra ye te honti -- gahapatii vaa gahapatiputtaa vaa daharaa vaa vuddhasiilino, vuddhaa vaa vuddhasiilino, saddhaasampannaa, siilasampannaa, caagasampannaa, pa~n~naasampannaa -- tehi saddhi.m santi.t.thati sallapati saakaccha.m samaapajjati; yathaaruupaana.m saddhaasampannaana.m saddhaasampada.m anusikkhati, yathaaruupaana.m siilasampannaana.m siilasampada.m anusikkhati, yathaaruupaana.m caagasampannaana.m caagasampada.m anusikkhati, yathaaruupaana.m pa~n~naasampannaana.m pa~n~naasampada.m anusikkhati. aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, kalyaa.namittataa.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^M3.0112^ea^ ca, braahma.na, samajiivitaa? idha, braahma.na, kulaputto aaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa vaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa sama.m jiivika.m kappeti naaccogaa.lha.m ^a^P4.0287^ea^ naatihiina.m -- `eva.m me aayo vaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, na ca me vayo aaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassatii'ti. seyyathaapi, braahma.na, tulaadhaaro vaa tulaadhaarantevaasii vaa tula.m paggahetvaa jaanaati -- `ettakena vaa onata.m, ettakena vaa unnata'nti; evameva.m kho, braahma.na, kulaputto aaya~nca ^a^T4.0296^ea^ bhogaana.m viditvaa vaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa sama.m jiivika.m kappeti naaccogaa.lha.m naatihiina.m -- `eva.m me aayo vaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, na ca me vayo aaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassatii'ti. sacaaya.m, braahma.na, kulaputto appaayo samaano u.laara.m jiivika.m kappeti, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `udumbarakhaadiivaaya.m kulaputto bhoge khaadatii'ti. sace panaaya.m, braahma.na, kulaputto mahaayo samaano kasira.m jiivika.m kappeti, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `aje.t.thamara.na.mvaaya.m kulaputto marissatii'ti. yato ca khoya.m, braahma.na, kulaputto aaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa vaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa sama.m jiivika.m kappeti naaccogaa.lha.m naatihiina.m -- `eva.m me aayo vaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, na ca me vayo aaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassatii'ti, aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, samajiivitaa.

[03] ``eva.m samuppannaana.m, braahma.na, bhogaana.m cattaari apaayamukhaani honti -- itthidhutto, suraadhutto, akkhadhutto, paapamitto paapasahaayo paapasampava"nko. seyyathaapi, braahma.na, mahato ta.laakassa cattaari ceva aayamukhaani, cattaari ca apaayamukhaani. tassa puriso yaani ceva aayamukhaani taani pidaheyya, yaani ca apaayamukhaani taani vivareyya; devo ca na sammaa dhaara.m anuppaveccheyya. eva~nhi tassa braahma.na ^a^P4.0288^ea^, mahato ta.laakassa parihaaniyeva paa.tika"nkhaa, no vuddhi ^a^V3.0115^ea^; evameva.m kho, braahma.na, eva.m samuppannaana.m bhogaana.m cattaari apaayamukhaani honti -- itthidhutto, suraadhutto, akkhadhutto, paapamitto paapasahaayo paapasampava"nko.

[03] ``eva.m ^a^T4.0297^ea^ samuppannaana.m, braahma.na, bhogaana.m cattaari aayamukhaani honti -- na itthidhutto, na suraadhutto, na akkhadhutto, kalyaa.namitto kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko. seyyathaapi, braahma.na, mahato ta.laakassa cattaari ceva aayamukhaani cattaari ca apaayamukhaani. tassa puriso yaani ceva aayamukhaani taani vivareyya, yaani ca apaayamukhaani ^a^M3.0113^ea^ taani pidaheyya; devo ca sammaa dhaara.m anuppaveccheyya. eva~nhi tassa, braahma.na, mahato ta.laakassa vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani; evameva.m kho, braahma.na, eva.m samuppannaana.m bhogaana.m cattaari aayamukhaani honti -- na itthidhutto...pe0... kalyaa.nasampava"nko. ime kho, braahma.na, cattaaro dhammaa kulaputtassa di.t.thadhammahitaaya sa.mvattanti di.t.thadhammasukhaaya.

[03] ``cattaarome, braahma.na, kulaputtassa dhammaa samparaayahitaaya sa.mvattanti samparaayasukhaaya. katame cattaaro? saddhaasampadaa, siilasampadaa, caagasampadaa, pa~n~naasampadaa. katamaa ca, braahma.na, saddhaasampadaa? idha, braahma.na, kulaputto saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, saddhaasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, braahma.na, siilasampadaa? idha, braahma.na, kulaputto paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti...pe0... suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti. aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, siilasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^T4.0298^ea^ ca, braahma.na, caagasampadaa? idha ^a^P4.0289^ea^, braahma.na, kulaputto vigatamalamaccherena cetasaa agaara.m ajjhaavasati muttacaago payatapaa.ni vossaggarato yaacayogo daanasa.mvibhaagarato. aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, caagasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, braahma.na, pa~n~naasampadaa? idha, braahma.na, kulaputto pa~n~navaa hoti...pe0... sammaa ^a^V3.0116^ea^ dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, pa~n~naasampadaa. ime kho, braahma.na, cattaaro dhammaa kulaputtassa samparaayahitaaya sa.mvattanti samparaayasukhaayaa''ti.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ ```bhaya'nti ^a^M3.0114^ea^ {cuu.lani0 khaggavisaa.nasuttaniddesa 137}, bhikkhave, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m. `dukkha'nti, bhikkhave, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m. `rogo'ti, bhikkhave, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m. `ga.n.do'ti, bhikkhave, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m. `salla'nti, bhikkhave, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m. `sa"ngo'ti, bhikkhave, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m. `pa"nko'ti, bhikkhave, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m ^a^T4.0299^ea^. `gabbho'ti, bhikkhave, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m. kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, `bhaya'nti kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m? yasmaa ca kaamaraagarattaaya.m, bhikkhave, chandaraagavinibaddho di.t.thadhammikaapi bhayaa na parimuccati, samparaayikaapi ^a^P4.0290^ea^ bhayaa na parimuccati, tasmaa `bhaya'nti kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m. kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, `dukkha'nti...pe0... `rogo'ti... `ga.n.do'ti... `salla'nti... `sa"ngo'ti... `pa"nko'ti... `gabbho'ti kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m? yasmaa ca kaamaraagarattaaya.m, bhikkhave, chandaraagavinibaddho di.t.thadhammikaapi gabbhaa na parimuccati, samparaayikaapi gabbhaa na parimuccati, tasmaa `gabbho'ti kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m''.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi a.t.thahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti ^a^T4.0300^ea^ ...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; kalyaa.namitto hoti kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko ^a^M3.0115^ea^; sammaadi.t.thiko hoti, sammaadassanena ^a^P4.0291^ea^ samannaagato; catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati; dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati; aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi a.t.thahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti ^a^V3.0118^ea^ ...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; aaraddhaviiriyo viharati thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu; aara~n~niko hoti pantasenaasano; aratiratisaho hoti, uppanna.m arati.m abhibhuyya abhibhuyya viharati; bhayabheravasaho hoti, uppanna.m bhayabherava.m abhibhuyya abhibhuyya viharati ^a^P4.0292^ea^; catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa ^a^T4.0301^ea^ upasampajja viharati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 8.77} ``a.t.thime ^a^V3.0120^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame a.t.tha? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato niraayattavuttino icchaa uppajjati laabhaaya. so u.t.thahati gha.tati vaayamati laabhaaya. tassa u.t.thahato gha.tato vaayamato laabhaaya laabho nuppajjati. so tena alaabhena socati kilamati paridevati, urattaa.li.m kandati, sammoha.m aapajjati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave -- `bhikkhu iccho viharati laabhaaya ^a^M3.0117^ea^, u.t.thahati ^a^P4.0294^ea^ gha.tati vaayamati laabhaaya, na ca laabhii, socii ca paridevii ca, cuto ca saddhammaa'''.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato niraayattavuttino icchaa uppajjati laabhaaya. so u.t.thahati gha.tati vaayamati laabhaaya. tassa u.t.thahato gha.tato vaayamato laabhaaya laabho uppajjati. so tena laabhena majjati pamajjati pamaadamaapajjati. aya.m ^a^T4.0303^ea^ vuccati, bhikkhave -- `bhikkhu iccho viharati laabhaaya, u.t.thahati gha.tati vaayamati laabhaaya, laabhii ca madii ca pamaadii ca, cuto ca saddhammaa'''.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ ``chahi ^a^P4.0296^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m attano ala.m paresa.m. katamehi chahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu; sutaana~nca dhammaana.m dhaara.najaatiko {dhaarakajaatiko (sii0 syaa0 pii0) a0 ni0 8.78} hoti; dhaataana~nca {dhataana~nca (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} dhammaana.m atthuupaparikkhitaa {atthuupavarikkhii (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} hoti; atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno ca hoti; kalyaa.navaaco ca hoti kalyaa.navaakkara.no, poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya anelaga.laaya atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa; sandassako ca hoti samaadapako {samaadaapako (?)} samuttejako ^a^M3.0119^ea^ sampaha.msako sabrahmacaariina.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m attano ala.m paresa.m.
