[03] 67^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thime ^a^P4.0307^ea^, bhikkhave, anariyavohaaraa. katame a.t.tha? adi.t.the di.t.thavaaditaa, asute sutavaaditaa, amute mutavaaditaa, avi~n~naate vi~n~naatavaaditaa, di.t.the adi.t.thavaaditaa, sute asutavaaditaa, mute amutavaaditaa, vi~n~naate avi~n~naatavaaditaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha anariyavohaaraa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thime, bhikkhave, ariyavohaaraa. katame a.t.tha? adi.t.the adi.t.thavaaditaa, asute asutavaaditaa, amute amutavaaditaa, avi~n~naate avi~n~naatavaaditaa, di.t.the di.t.thavaaditaa, sute sutavaaditaa, mute mutavaaditaa, vi~n~naate vi~n~naatavaaditaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha ariyavohaaraa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thimaa, bhikkhave, parisaa. katamaa a.t.tha? khattiyaparisaa ^a^T4.0317^ea^, braahma.naparisaa, gahapatiparisaa, sama.naparisaa, caatumahaaraajikaparisaa, taavati.msaparisaa, maaraparisaa, brahmaparisaa. abhijaanaami kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, anekasata.m ^a^M3.0128^ea^ khattiyaparisa.m upasa"nkamitaa. tatrapi mayaa sannisinnapubba~nceva sallapitapubba~nca saakacchaa ca samaapannapubbaa. tattha yaadisako tesa.m va.n.no hoti taadisako mayha.m va.n.no hoti, yaadisako tesa.m saro hoti taadisako mayha.m saro hoti. dhammiyaa ca kathaaya sandassemi samaadapemi samuttejemi sampaha.msemi ^a^V3.0132^ea^. bhaasamaana~nca ma.m na jaananti -- `ko nu kho aya.m bhaasati devo vaa manusso vaa'ti. dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa antaradhaayaami. antarahita~nca ma.m na jaananti -- `ko nu kho aya.m antarahito devo vaa manusso vaa'''ti.

[03] ``abhijaanaami ^a^P4.0308^ea^ kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, anekasata.m braahma.naparisa.m...pe0... gahapatiparisa.m... sama.naparisa.m... caatumahaaraajikaparisa.m... taavati.msaparisa.m... maaraparisa.m... brahmaparisa.m upasa"nkamitaa. tatrapi mayaa sannisinnapubba~nceva sallapitapubba~nca saakacchaa ca samaapannapubbaa. tattha yaadisako tesa.m va.n.no hoti taadisako mayha.m va.n.no hoti, yaadisako tesa.m saro hoti taadisako mayha.m saro hoti. dhammiyaa ca kathaaya sandassemi samaadapemi samuttejemi sampaha.msemi. bhaasamaana~nca ma.m na jaananti -- `ko nu kho aya.m bhaasati devo vaa manusso vaa'ti. dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa antaradhaayaami. antarahita~nca ma.m na jaananti -- `ko nu ^a^T4.0318^ea^ kho aya.m antarahito devo vaa manusso vaa'ti. imaa kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha parisaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya vesaali.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. vesaaliya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ga.nhaahi, aananda, nisiidana.m. yena caapaala.m cetiya.m {paavaalacetiya.m (syaa0), caapaalacetiya.m (pii0 ka0)} tenupasa"nkamissaama divaavihaaraayaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa nisiidana.m aadaaya bhagavanta.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhi.

[03] atha ^a^M3.0129^ea^ kho bhagavaa yena caapaala.m cetiya.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``rama.niiyaa ^a^P4.0309^ea^, aananda, vesaalii, rama.niiya.m udena.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m gotamaka.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m sattamba.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m bahuputtaka.m cetiya.m; rama.niiya.m saarandada.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m caapaala.m cetiya.m. yassa kassaci ^a^V3.0133^ea^, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, aaka"nkhamaano so, aananda, kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa. tathaagatassa kho, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa. aaka"nkhamaano, aananda, tathaagato kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa''ti. evampi kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavataa o.laarike nimitte kayiramaane o.laarike ^a^T4.0219^ea^ obhaase kayiramaane naasakkhi pa.tivijjhitu.m; na bhagavanta.m yaaci -- ``ti.t.thatu, bhante, bhagavaa kappa.m, ti.t.thatu sugato kappa.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana''nti, yathaa ta.m maarena pariyu.t.thitacitto.

[03] dutiyampi kho bhagavaa...pe0... tatiyampi kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``rama.niiyaa, aananda, vesaalii, rama.niiya.m udena.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m gotamaka.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m sattamba.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m bahuputtaka.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m saarandada.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m caapaala.m cetiya.m. yassa kassaci, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, aaka"nkhamaano so, aananda, kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa. tathaagatassa kho, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa...pe0... aaka"nkhamaano, aananda, tathaagato kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa''ti. evampi kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavataa ^a^P4.0310^ea^ o.laarike nimitte kayiramaane o.laarike obhaase kayiramaane naasakkhi pa.tivijjhitu.m; na bhagavanta.m yaaci -- ``ti.t.thatu, bhante, bhagavaa kappa.m, ti.t.thatu sugato kappa.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana''nti, yathaa ta.m maarena pariyu.t.thitacitto.

[03] atha ^a^M3.0130^ea^ kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``gaccha tva.m {gaccha kho tva.m (sa.m0 ni0 5.822) udaa0 51 passitabba.m}, aananda, yassa daani kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa bhagavato aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiidi. atha kho maaro paapimaa acirapakkante aayasmante aanande bhagavanta.m ^a^T4.0320^ea^ etadavoca --

[03] ``parinibbaatu daani, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu sugato. parinibbaanakaalo daani, bhante ^a^V3.0134^ea^, bhagavato. bhaasitaa kho panesaa, bhante, bhagavataa vaacaa -- `na taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami yaava me bhikkhuu na saavakaa bhavissanti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa pattayogakkhemaa {ida.m pada.m dii0 ni0 2.168 ca sa.m0 ni0 5.822 ca na dissati} bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaarino, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhissanti desessanti pa~n~napessanti pa.t.thapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttaaniikarissanti uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desessantii'ti. etarahi, bhante, bhikkhuu bhagavato saavakaa viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa pattayogakkhemaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaarino, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhanti desenti pa~n~napenti pa.t.thapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttaaniikaronti uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desenti.

[03] ``parinibbaatu daani, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu sugato. parinibbaanakaalo daani, bhante, bhagavato. bhaasitaa kho panesaa, bhante, bhagavataa vaacaa -- `na taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami yaava me bhikkhuniyo na saavikaa bhavissanti...pe0... yaava me upaasakaa na saavakaa ^a^P4.0311^ea^ bhavissanti...pe0... yaava me upaasikaa na saavikaa bhavissanti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa pattayogakkhemaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaariniyo, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa ^a^T4.0321^ea^ aacikkhissanti desessanti pa~n~napessanti pa.t.thapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttaaniikarissanti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desessantii'ti. etarahi, bhante, upaasikaa bhagavato saavikaa viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa pattayogakkhemaa bahussutaa ^a^M3.0131^ea^ dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaariniyo, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhanti desenti pa~n~napenti pa.t.thapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttaaniikaronti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desenti.

[03] ``parinibbaatu daani, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu sugato. parinibbaanakaalo daani, bhante, bhagavato. bhaasitaa kho panesaa, bhante, bhagavataa vaacaa -- `na taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami yaava me ida.m brahmacariya.m na iddha~nceva bhavissati phiita~nca vitthaarika.m baahuja~n~na.m ^a^V3.0135^ea^ puthubhuuta.m, yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita'nti. etarahi, bhante, bhagavato brahmacariya.m iddha~nceva phiita~nca vitthaarika.m baahuja~n~na.m puthubhuuta.m, yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita.m.

[03] ``parinibbaatu daani, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu sugato. parinibbaanakaalo daani, bhante, bhagavato''ti. ``appossukko tva.m, paapima, hohi. nacira.m tathaagatassa parinibbaana.m bhavissati. ito ti.n.na.m maasaana.m accayena tathaagato parinibbaayissatii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa caapaale cetiye sato sampajaano aayusa"nkhaara.m ossaji. ossa.t.the ca bhagavataa aayusa"nkhaare ^a^T4.0322^ea^ mahaabhuumicaalo ahosi bhi.msanako salomaha.mso, devadundubhiyo ca phali.msu. atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``tulamatula~nca ^a^P4.0312^ea^ sambhava.m, bhavasa"nkhaaramavassaji muni.
[22] ajjhattarato samaahito, abhindi kavacamivattasambhava''nti..

[03] atha kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``mahaa vataaya.m bhuumicaalo; sumahaa vataaya.m bhuumicaalo bhi.msanako salomaha.mso, devadundubhiyo ca phali.msu. ko nu kho hetu, ko paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaayaa''ti?

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``mahaa vataaya.m, bhante, bhuumicaalo ^a^M3.0132^ea^; sumahaa vataaya.m, bhante, bhuumicaalo bhi.msanako salomaha.mso, devadundubhiyo ca phali.msu. ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaayaa''ti?

[03] ``a.t.thime, aananda, hetuu, a.t.tha paccayaa mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya. katame a.t.tha? aya.m, aananda, mahaapathavii udake pati.t.thitaa; udaka.m vaate pati.t.thita.m; vaato aakaasa.t.tho hoti. so, aananda, samayo ya.m mahaavaataa vaayanti; mahaavaataa vaayantaa udaka.m kampenti; udaka.m ^a^V3.0136^ea^ kampita.m pathavi.m kampeti. aya.m, aananda, pa.thamo hetu, pa.thamo paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, sama.no vaa braahma.no ^a^T4.0323^ea^ vaa iddhimaa cetovasippatto devataa vaa mahiddhikaa mahaanubhaavaa. tassa parittaa pathaviisa~n~naa bhaavitaa hoti, appamaa.naa aaposa~n~naa. so ima.m pathavi.m kampeti sa"nkampeti sampakampeti sampavedheti. aya.m, aananda, dutiyo hetu, dutiyo paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, yadaa bodhisatto tusitaa kaayaa cavitvaa sato sampajaano maatukucchi.m okkamati, tadaaya.m pathavii ^a^P4.0313^ea^ kampati sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhati. aya.m, aananda, tatiyo hetu; tatiyo paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, yadaa bodhisatto sato sampajaano maatukucchismaa nikkhamati, tadaaya.m pathavii kampati sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhati. aya.m, aananda, catuttho hetu, catuttho paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, yadaa tathaagato anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhati, tadaaya.m pathavii kampati sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhati. aya.m, aananda, pa~ncamo hetu, pa~ncamo paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, yadaa tathaagato anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavatteti, tadaaya.m pathavii kampati sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhati. aya.m, aananda, cha.t.tho hetu, cha.t.tho paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0133^ea^ capara.m, aananda, yadaa tathaagato sato sampajaano aayusa"nkhaara.m ossajjati, tadaaya.m pathavii kampati sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhati. aya.m, aananda, sattamo hetu, sattamo paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya.

[03] ``puna ^a^V3.0137^ea^ capara.m, aananda, yadaa tathaagato anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa ^a^T4.0324^ea^ parinibbaayati, tadaaya.m pathavii kampati sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhati. aya.m, aananda, a.t.thamo hetu, a.t.thamo paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya. ime kho, aananda, a.t.tha hetuu, a.t.tha paccayaa mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaayaa''ti. dasama.m.
[06] bhuumicaalavaggo dutiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] icchaa ^a^P4.0314^ea^ ala~nca sa.mkhitta.m, gayaa abhibhunaa saha.
[22] vimokkho dve ca vohaaraa, parisaa bhuumicaalenaati..

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ ``saddho ^a^V3.0138^ea^ ca {saddho (syaa0) ettheva. a0 ni0 9.4}, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti, no ca {no (syaa0) evamuparipi ``no''tveva dissati} siilavaa. eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro hoti. tena ta.m a"nga.m paripuuretabba.m -- `kintaaha.m saddho ca assa.m siilavaa caa'ti. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti siilavaa ca, eva.m so tena"ngena paripuuro hoti.

[03] ``saddho ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti siilavaa ca, no ca bahussuto. eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro hoti. tena ta.m a"nga.m paripuuretabba.m -- `kintaaha.m saddho ca assa.m, siilavaa ca, bahussuto caa'ti. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti siilavaa ca bahussuto ca, eva.m so tena"ngena paripuuro hoti.

[03] ``saddho ^a^M3.0134^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti siilavaa ca bahussuto ca, no ca dhammakathiko...pe0... dhammakathiko ca, no ca parisaavacaro...pe0... parisaavacaro ca, no ca visaarado parisaaya dhamma.m deseti...pe0... visaarado ca parisaaya dhamma.m deseti, no ca catunna.m ^a^T4.0325^ea^ jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii...pe0... catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, no ca aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati; eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro hoti. tena ta.m a"nga.m paripuuretabba.m ^a^P4.0315^ea^ -- `kintaaha.m saddho ca assa.m, siilavaa ca, bahussuto ca, dhammakathiko ca, parisaavacaro ca, visaarado ca parisaaya dhamma.m deseyya.m, catunna~nca jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii assa.m akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, aasavaana~nca khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya'''nti.

[01] ``yato ^a^V3.0139^ea^ ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti, siilavaa ca, bahussuto ca, dhammakathiko ca, parisaavacaro ca, visaarado ca parisaaya dhamma.m deseti, catunna~nca jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, aasavaana~nca khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati; eva.m so tena"ngena paripuuro hoti. imehi, kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu samantapaasaadiko ca hoti sabbaakaaraparipuuro caa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] ``katha.m bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, mara.nassati katha.m bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu divase nikkhante rattiyaa patihitaaya {pa.tihitaaya (pii0), (a0 ni0 6.20 passitabba.m)} iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `bahukaa kho me paccayaa mara.nassa -- ahi vaa ma.m .da.mseyya, vicchiko vaa ma.m .da.mseyya, satapadii vaa ma.m .da.mseyya; tena me assa kaalakiriyaa. so mama assa {mamassa (a0 ni0 6.20)} antaraayo. upakkhalitvaa vaa papateyya.m, bhatta.m vaa me bhutta.m byaapajjeyya, pitta.m vaa me kuppeyya, semha.m vaa me kuppeyya, satthakaa vaa me vaataa kuppeyyu.m ^a^M3.0139^ea^, manussaa vaa ma.m upakkameyyu.m, amanussaa vaa ma.m upakkameyyu.m; tena me assa kaalakiriyaa. so mama assa antaraayo'ti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhitabba.m -- `atthi nu kho me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa appahiinaa ye me assu ratti.m kaala.m karontassa antaraayaayaa'''ti.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `atthi me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa appahiinaa ye me assu ratti.m kaala.m karontassa antaraayaayaa'ti, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nc kara.niiya.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aadittacelo vaa aadittasiiso vaa tasseva celassa vaa siisassa vaa nibbaapanaaya adhimatta.m chanda~nca vaayaama~nca ussaaha~nca usso.lhi~nca ^a^T4.0332^ea^ appa.tivaani~nca sati~nca sampaja~n~na~nca kareyya; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tena bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m ^a^P4.0321^ea^ dhammaana.m pahaanaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nc kara.niiya.m.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thimaa ^a^M3.0141^ea^, bhikkhave, sampadaa. katamaa a.t.tha? u.t.thaanasampadaa, aarakkhasampadaa, kalyaa.namittataa, samajiivitaa, saddhaasampadaa, siilasampadaa, caagasampadaa, pa~n~naasampadaa. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, u.t.thaanasampadaa? idha, bhikkhave, kulaputto yena kamma.t.thaanena jiivita.m kappeti -- yadi kasiyaa yadi va.nijjaaya yadi gorakkhena yadi issattena yadi raajaporisena yadi sippa~n~natarena -- tattha ^a^P4.0323^ea^ dakkho hoti analaso, tatrupaayaaya viima.msaaya samannaagato, ala.m kaatu.m ala.m sa.mvidhaatunti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, u.t.thaanasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, aarakkhasampadaa? idha, bhikkhave, kulaputtassa bhogaa honti u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigataa ^a^V3.0146^ea^ baahaabalaparicitaa sedaavakkhittaa dhammikaa dhammaladdhaa te aarakkhena guttiyaa sampaadeti -- `kinti me bhoge neva raajaano hareyyu.m, na coraa hareyyu.m, na aggi .daheyya, na udaka.m vaheyya, na appiyaa daayaadaa hareyyu'nti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, aarakkhasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^T4.0335^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, kalyaa.namittataa? idha, bhikkhave, kulaputto yasmi.m gaame vaa nigame vaa pa.tivasati, tattha ye te honti gahapatii vaa gahapatiputtaa vaa daharaa vaa vuddhasiilino vuddhaa vaa vuddhasiilino saddhaasampannaa siilasampannaa caagasampannaa pa~n~naasampannaa, tehi saddhi.m santi.t.thati sallapati saakaccha.m samaapajjati; yathaaruupaana.m saddhaasampannaana.m saddhaasampada.m anusikkhati, yathaaruupaana.m siilasampannaana.m siilasampada.m anusikkhati, yathaaruupaana.m caagasampannaana.m caagasampada.m anusikkhati, yathaaruupaana.m pa~n~naasampannaana.m pa~n~naasampada.m anusikkhati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, kalyaa.namittataa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, samajiivitaa? idha, bhikkhave, kulaputto aaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa vaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa sama.m jiivika.m kappeti naaccogaa.lha.m naatihiina.m -- `eva.m me aayo vaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, na ca me vayo aaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassatii'ti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, tulaadhaaro vaa tulaadhaarantevaasii vaa tula.m paggahetvaa jaanaati -- `ettakena vaa onata.m, ettakena ^a^P4.0324^ea^ vaa unnata'nti; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, kulaputto aaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa vaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa sama.m jiivika.m kappeti naaccogaa.lha.m naatihiina.m -- `eva.m me aayo vaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, na ca me vayo aaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassatii'ti. sacaaya.m, bhikkhave, kulaputto ^a^M3.0142^ea^ appaayo samaano u.laara.m jiivika.m kappeti, tassa bhavanti vattaaro `udumbarakhaadii vaaya.m kulaputto bhoge khaadatii'ti. sace panaaya.m, bhikkhave, kulaputto ^a^T4.0336^ea^ mahaayo samaano kasira.m jiivika.m kappeti, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `aje.t.thamara.na.m vaaya.m kulaputto marissatii'ti. yato ca khoya.m, bhikkhave, kulaputto aaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa vaya~nca bhogaana.m viditvaa sama.m jiivika.m kappeti naaccogaa.lha.m naatihiina.m -- `eva.m me aayo vaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, na ca me vayo aaya.m pariyaadaaya .thassatii'ti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, samajiivitaa.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^V3.0147^ea^ ca bhikkhave, saddhaasampadaa? idha, bhikkhave, kulaputto saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, saddhaasampadaa.

[03] {a0 ni0 8.61} ``a.t.thime, aavuso, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame a.t.tha? idhaavuso, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato niraayattavuttino icchaa uppajjati laabhaaya. so u.t.thahati, gha.tati, vaayamati laabhaaya. tassa u.t.thahato, gha.tato, vaayamato laabhaaya laabho nuppajjati. so tena alaabhena socati kilamati paridevati, urattaa.li.m kandati, sammoha.m aapajjati. aya.m vuccataavuso, `bhikkhu iccho viharati laabhaaya, u.t.thahati, gha.tati ^a^P4.0326^ea^, vaayamati laabhaaya, na ca laabhii, socii ca paridevii ca, cuto ca saddhammaa'''.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 8.62} tatra ^a^M3.0145^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi...pe0... chahaavuso, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m attano, ala.m paresa.m. katamehi chahi? idhaavuso, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu; sutaana~nca dhammaana.m dhaara.najaatiko hoti; dhaataana~nca dhammaana.m atthuupaparikkhitaa hoti; atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno ca hoti; kalyaa.navaaco ca hoti kalyaa.navaakkara.no, poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya anelaga.laaya atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa; sandassako ca hoti samaadapako samuttejako sampaha.msako sabrahmacaariina.m. imehi kho, aavuso, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m attano, ala.m paresa.m.

[03] ``pa~ncahaavuso, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m attano, ala.m paresa.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? idhaavuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu; sutaana~nca dhammaana.m dhaara.najaatiko hoti; dhaataana~nca dhammaana.m atthuupaparikkhitaa hoti; atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno ca hoti; kalyaa.navaaco ca hoti...pe0... sandassako ca hoti...pe0... sabrahmacaariina.m. imehi ^a^P4.0329^ea^ kho, aavuso, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m attano, ala.m paresa.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0150^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya caranto labhati luukhassa vaa pa.niitassa vaa bhojanassa yaavadattha.m paaripuuri.m. tassa eva.m hoti -- aha.m kho gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya caranto alattha.m luukhassa vaa pa.niitassa vaa bhojanassa yaavadattha.m paaripuuri.m. tassa me kaayo balavaa kamma~n~no. handaaha.m viiriya.m aarabhaami...pe0... ida.m, bhikkhave, cha.t.tha.m aarambhavatthu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppanno hoti appamattako aabaadho. tassa eva.m hoti -- uppanno kho me aya.m appamattako aabaadho. .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m me aabaadho pava.d.dheyya. handaaha.m pa.tikacceva viiriya.m aarabhaami...pe0... ida.m, bhikkhave, sattama.m aarambhavatthu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilaanaa vu.t.thito hoti aciravu.t.thito gela~n~naa. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m kho gilaanaa vu.t.thito aciravu.t.thito gela~n~naa. .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m me aabaadho paccudaavatteyya. handaaha.m pa.tikacceva viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaayaa'ti. so viiriya.m aarabhati appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. ida.m, bhikkhave, a.t.thama.m aarambhavatthu. imaani kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha aarambhavatthuunii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] yamakavaggo tatiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m ^a^V3.0156^ea^ --
[21] dve ^a^T4.0348^ea^ ^a^P4.0336^ea^ saddhaa dve mara.nassatii, dve sampadaa athaapare.
[22] icchaa ala.m parihaana.m, kusiitaarambhavatthuuniiti..

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ``satisampaja~n~ne ^a^V3.0157^ea^, bhikkhave, asati satisampaja~n~navipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti hirottappa.m. hirottappe asati hirottappavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti indriyasa.mvaro. indriyasa.mvare asati indriyasa.mvaravipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti ^a^M3.0151^ea^ siila.m. siile asati siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti sammaasamaadhi. sammaasamaadhimhi asati sammaasamaadhivipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m. yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane asati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti nibbidaaviraago. nibbidaaviraage asati nibbidaaviraagavipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, rukkho saakhaapalaasavipanno. tassa papa.tikaapi na paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi... pheggupi... saaropi na paaripuuri.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, satisampaja~n~ne asati satisampaja~n~navipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti hirottappa.m; hirottappe asati hirottappavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassana.m.

[03] ``satisampaja~n~ne, bhikkhave, sati satisampaja~n~nasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti hirottappa.m. hirottappe sati hirottappasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti indriyasa.mvaro. indriyasa.mvare sati indriyasa.mvarasampannassa ^a^T4.0349^ea^ upanisasampanna.m hoti siila.m. siile sati siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammaasamaadhi. sammaasamaadhimhi sati sammaasamaadhisampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m. yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane sati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidaaviraago ^a^P4.0337^ea^. nibbidaaviraage sati nibbidaaviraagasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, rukkho saakhaapalaasasampanno. tassa papa.tikaapi paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi... pheggupi... saaropi paaripuuri.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, satisampaja~n~ne sati satisampaja~n~nasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti hirottappa.m; hirottappe sati hirottappasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassana''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V3.0158^ea^ kho aayasmaa pu.n.niyo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa pu.n.niyo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena appekadaa tathaagata.m dhammadesanaa pa.tibhaati, appekadaa na pa.tibhaatii''ti? ``saddho ca, pu.n.niya, bhikkhu hoti, no cupasa"nkamitaa; neva tathaagata.m dhammadesanaa pa.tibhaati. yato ca kho ^a^M3.0152^ea^, pu.n.niya, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti, upasa"nkamitaa ca; eva.m tathaagata.m dhammadesanaa pa.tibhaati. saddho ca, pu.n.niya, bhikkhu hoti, upasa"nkamitaa ca, no ca payirupaasitaa...pe0... payirupaasitaa ca, no ca paripucchitaa... paripucchitaa ^a^T4.0350^ea^ ca, no ca ohitasoto dhamma.m su.naati... ohitasoto ca dhamma.m su.naati, no ca sutvaa dhamma.m dhaareti... sutvaa ca dhamma.m dhaareti, no ca dhaataana.m dhammaana.m attha.m upaparikkhati... dhaataana~nca dhammaana.m attha.m upaparikkhati, no ca atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno hoti. neva taava tathaagata.m dhammadesanaa pa.tibhaati.

[03] ``yato ca kho, pu.n.niya, bhikkhu saddho ca ^a^P4.0338^ea^ hoti, upasa"nkamitaa ca, payirupaasitaa ca, paripucchitaa ca, ohitasoto ca dhamma.m su.naati, sutvaa ca dhamma.m dhaareti, dhaataana~nca dhammaana.m attha.m upaparikkhati, atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno ca hoti; eva.m tathaagata.m dhammadesanaa pa.tibhaati. imehi kho, pu.n.niya, a.t.thahi dhammehi samannaagataa {samannaagato (sii0 pii0), samannaagata.m (syaa0 ka0)} ekantapa.tibhaanaa {ekantapa.tibhaana.m (sabbattha) a0 ni0 10.83 pana passitabba.m} tathaagata.m dhammadesanaa hotii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 10.58 passitabba.m} ``sace, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `ki.mmuulakaa, aavuso, sabbe dhammaa, ki.msambhavaa sabbe dhammaa, ki.msamudayaa sabbe dhammaa, ki.msamosara.naa sabbe dhammaa, ki.mpamukhaa sabbe dhammaa, ki.madhipateyyaa sabbe dhammaa, ki.muttaraa sabbe dhammaa, ki.msaaraa sabbe dhammaa'ti, eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m kinti byaakareyyaathaa''ti? ``bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa, bhagava.mnettikaa bhagava.mpa.tisara.naa. saadhu, bhante ^a^V3.0159^ea^, bhagavanta.myeva pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti.

[03] ``tena hi, bhikkhave, desessaami. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti ^a^T4.0351^ea^. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sace, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `ki.mmuulakaa, aavuso, sabbe dhammaa, ki.msambhavaa sabbe dhammaa, ki.msamudayaa sabbe dhammaa, ki.msamosara.naa sabbe dhammaa, ki.mpamukhaa sabbe dhammaa ^a^M3.0153^ea^, ki.madhipateyyaa ^a^P4.0339^ea^ sabbe dhammaa, ki.muttaraa sabbe dhammaa, ki.msaaraa sabbe dhammaa'ti, eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaatha -- `chandamuulakaa, aavuso, sabbe dhammaa, manasikaarasambhavaa sabbe dhammaa, phassasamudayaa sabbe dhammaa, vedanaasamosara.naa sabbe dhammaa, samaadhippamukhaa sabbe dhammaa, sataadhipateyyaa sabbe dhammaa, pa~n~nuttaraa sabbe dhammaa, vimuttisaaraa sabbe dhammaa'ti, eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaathaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato mahaacoro khippa.m pariyaapajjati, na cira.t.thitiko hoti. katamehi a.t.thahi? appaharantassa paharati, anavasesa.m aadiyati, itthi.m hanati, kumaari.m duuseti, pabbajita.m vilumpati, raajakosa.m vilumpati, accaasanne kamma.m karoti, na ca nidhaanakusalo hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagato mahaacoro khippa.m pariyaapajjati, na cira.t.thitiko hoti.

[03] ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato mahaacoro na khippa.m pariyaapajjati, cira.t.thitiko hoti. katamehi a.t.thahi? na appaharantassa paharati ^a^T4.0352^ea^, na anavasesa.m aadiyati, na itthi.m hanati, na kumaari.m duuseti, na pabbajita.m vilumpati, na raajakosa.m vilumpati, na accaasanne kamma.m karoti, nidhaanakusalo ca hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagato mahaacoro na khippa.m pariyaapajjati, cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ ```sama.no'ti ^a^V3.0160^ea^ ^a^P4.0340^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. `braahma.no'ti, bhikkhave, tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. `vedaguu'ti, bhikkhave, tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. `bhisakko'ti, bhikkhave, tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. `nimmalo'ti, bhikkhave, tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. `vimalo'ti, bhikkhave, tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. `~naa.nii'ti, bhikkhave, tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato ^a^M3.0154^ea^ sammaasambuddhassa. `vimutto'ti, bhikkhave, tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassaa''ti.
[21] ``ya.m sama.nena pattabba.m, braahma.nena vusiimataa.
[22] ya.m vedagunaa pattabba.m, bhisakkena anuttara.m..
[21] ``ya.m nimmalena pattabba.m, vimalena suciimataa.
[22] ya.m ~naa.ninaa ca pattabba.m, vimuttena anuttara.m..
[21] ``soha.m vijitasa"ngaamo, mutto mocemi bandhanaa.
[22] naagomhi paramadanto, asekho parinibbuto''ti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena ^a^T4.0353^ea^ saddhi.m yena icchaana"ngala.m naama kosalaana.m braahma.nagaamo tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa icchaana"ngale viharati icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de. assosu.m kho icchaana"ngalakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa -- ``sama.no khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito icchaana"ngala.m anuppatto icchaana"ngale viharati icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de ^a^P4.0341^ea^. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi ^a^V3.0161^ea^ so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho...pe0... saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotii'''ti.

[03] atha kho icchaana"ngalakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena pahuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m aadaaya yena icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.do tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bahidvaarako.t.thake a.t.tha.msu uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa naagito bhagavato upa.t.thaako hoti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m naagita.m aamantesi -- ``ke pana te, naagita, uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa keva.t.taa ma~n~ne macchavilope''ti? ``ete, bhante, icchaana"ngalakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa pahuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m aadaaya bahidvaarako.t.thake .thitaa bhagavanta.myeva uddissa bhikkhusa"ngha~ncaa''ti. ``maaha.m, naagita, yasena samaagama.m, maa ca mayaa yaso. yo kho, naagita, nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhii assa akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. yassaaha.m nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa ^a^M3.0155^ea^ nikaamalaabhii {nikaamalaabhii assa.m (bahuusu) a0 ni0 5.30 passitabba.m. tattha hi aya.m paa.thabhedaa natthi} akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, so ^a^T4.0354^ea^ ta.m mii.lhasukha.m middhasukha.m laabhasakkaarasilokasukha.m saadiyeyyaa''ti.

[03] ``adhivaasetu daani, bhante, bhagavaa. adhivaasetu sugato. adhivaasanakaalo daani, bhante, bhagavato. yena yeneva daani, bhante, bhagavaa gamissati tanninnaava bhavissanti braahma.nagahapatikaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca. seyyathaapi ^a^P4.0342^ea^, bhante, thullaphusitake deve vassante yathaaninna.m udakaani pavattanti; evameva.m kho, bhante, yena yeneva daani bhagavaa gamissati tanninnaava bhavissanti braahma.nagahapatikaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi, bhante, bhagavato siilapa~n~naa.na''nti.

[03] ``maaha.m, naagita, yasena samaagama.m, maa ca mayaa yaso. yo kho, naagita, nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhii assa akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. yassaaha.m nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, so ta.m mii.lhasukha.m middhasukha.m laabhasakkaarasilokasukha.m saadiyeyya.

[03] ``devataapi ^a^V3.0162^ea^ kho, naagita, ekaccaa nayimassa {ekaccaa imassa (?)} nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhiniyo assu {ida.m pada.m katthaci natthi} akicchalaabhiniyo {nikaamalaabhiniyo akicchalaabhiniyo (?)} akasiralaabhiniyo, yassaaha.m nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. tumhaakampi {taasampi (?)} kho, naagita, sa"ngamma samaagamma sa"nga.nikavihaara.m anuyuttaana.m viharata.m {anuyutte viharante disvaa (?)} eva.m hoti -- `na hi nuuname {na hanuuname (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} aayasmanto imassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhino assu {ida.m pada.m katthaci natthi} akicchalaabhino akasiralaabhino. yassaaha.m nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. tathaa hi ^a^M3.0156^ea^ pana me aayasmanto ^a^P4.0343^ea^ sa"ngamma samaagamma sa"nga.nikavihaara.m anuyuttaa viharanti'''.

[03] ``idhaaha.m ^a^T4.0355^ea^, naagita, bhikkhuu passaami a~n~nama~n~na.m a"ngulipatodakena {a"ngulipatodakehi (sii0 pii0 ka0)} sa~njagghante sa"nkii.lante. tassa mayha.m, naagita, eva.m hoti -- `na hi nuuname aayasmanto imassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhino assu akicchalaabhino akasiralaabhino. yassaaha.m nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. tathaa hi pana me aayasmanto a~n~nama~n~na.m a"ngulipatodakena sa~njagghanti sa"nkii.lanti'''.

[03] ``idha panaaha.m {idhaaha.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)}, naagita, bhikkhuu passaami yaavadattha.m udaraavadehaka.m bhu~njitvaa seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutte viharante. tassa mayha.m, naagita, eva.m hoti -- `na hi nuuname aayasmanto imassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhino assu akicchalaabhino akasiralaabhino. yassaaha.m nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. tathaa hi pana me aayasmanto yaavadattha.m udaraavadehaka.m bhu~njitvaa seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyuttaa viharanti'''.

[03] ``idhaaha.m {idha panaaha.m (?)}, naagita, bhikkhu.m passaami gaamantavihaari.m samaahita.m nisinna.m. tassa mayha.m, naagita, eva.m hoti -- `idaani ima.m {idaanima.m (katthaci) a0 ni0 6.42} aayasmanta.m aaraamiko vaa upa.t.thahissati {paccessati (sii0 pii0), upa.t.thahati (ka0)} sama.nuddeso vaa ^a^V3.0163^ea^. ta.m tamhaa {so tamhaa (ka0 sii0), so ta.m tamhaa (?)} samaadhimhaa caavessatii'ti. tenaaha.m ^a^P4.0344^ea^, naagita, tassa bhikkhuno na attamano homi gaamantavihaarena.

[03] ``idha panaaha.m, naagita, bhikkhu.m passaami aara~n~nika.m ara~n~ne pacalaayamaana.m nisinna.m. tassa mayha.m, naagita, eva.m hoti -- `idaani ayamaayasmaa ima.m niddaakilamatha.m pa.tivinodetvaa ara~n~nasa~n~na.myeva manasi karissati ekatta'nti ^a^T4.0356^ea^. tenaaha.m ^a^M3.0157^ea^, naagita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi ara~n~navihaarena.

[03] ``idha panaaha.m, naagita, bhikkhu.m passaami aara~n~nika.m ara~n~ne asamaahita.m nisinna.m. tassa mayha.m, naagita, eva.m hoti -- `idaani ayamaayasmaa asamaahita.m vaa citta.m samaadahissati {samaadahessati (katthaci)}, samaahita.m vaa citta.m anurakkhissatii'ti. tenaaha.m, naagita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi ara~n~navihaarena.

[03] ``idha panaaha.m, naagita, bhikkhu.m passaami aara~n~nika.m ara~n~ne samaahita.m nisinna.m. tassa mayha.m, naagita, eva.m hoti -- `idaani ayamaayasmaa avimutta.m vaa citta.m vimuccissati, vimutta.m vaa citta.m anurakkhissatii'ti. tenaaha.m, naagita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi ara~n~navihaarena.

[03] ``idha panaaha.m, naagita, bhikkhu.m passaami gaamantavihaari.m laabhi.m ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. so ta.m laabhasakkaarasiloka.m nikaamayamaano ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, ri~ncati ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani; gaamanigamaraajadhaani.m osaritvaa vaasa.m kappeti. tenaaha.m, naagita, tassa bhikkhuno na attamano homi gaamantavihaarena.

[03] ``idha panaaha.m, naagita, bhikkhu.m passaami aara~n~nika.m laabhi.m ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. so ta.m laabhasakkaarasiloka.m pa.tipa.naametvaa na ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, na ri~ncati ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani. tenaaha.m, naagita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi ara~n~navihaarena. {[ ] etthantare paa.tho a0 ni0 6.42 chakkanipaateyeva dissati, na ettha a.t.thakanipaate}

[01] ``yasmaaha.m ^a^T4.0357^ea^ ^a^V3.0164^ea^ {yasmi.mha.m (katthaci)}, naagita, samaye addhaanamaggappa.tipanno na ka~nci passaami purato vaa pacchato vaa, phaasu me, naagita, tasmi.m samaye hoti antamaso uccaarapassaavakammaayaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 265} ``a.t.thahi ^a^M3.0158^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatassa upaasakassa aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho patta.m nikkujjeyya {nikujjeyya (ka0)}. katamehi a.t.thahi? bhikkhuuna.m ^a^P4.0345^ea^ alaabhaaya parisakkati, bhikkhuuna.m anatthaaya parisakkati, bhikkhuuna.m avaasaaya {anaavaasaaya (sii0 syaa0)} parisakkati, bhikkhuu akkosati paribhaasati, bhikkhuu bhikkhuuhi bhedeti {vibhedeti (bahuusu)}, buddhassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, dhammassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, sa"nghassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagatassa upaasakassa aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho patta.m nikkujjeyya.

[03] ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatassa upaasakassa aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho patta.m ukkujjeyya. katamehi a.t.thahi? na bhikkhuuna.m alaabhaaya parisakkati, na bhikkhuuna.m anatthaaya parisakkati, na bhikkhuuna.m avaasaaya parisakkati, na bhikkhuu akkosati paribhaasati, na bhikkhuu bhikkhuuhi bhedeti, buddhassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, dhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, sa"nghassa va.n.na.m bhaasati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagatassa upaasakassa aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho patta.m ukkujjeyyaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno aaka"nkhamaanaa upaasakaa appasaada.m pavedeyyu.m. katamehi a.t.thahi? gihiina.m alaabhaaya parisakkati, gihiina.m anatthaaya parisakkati, gihii akkosati paribhaasati, gihii gihiihi bhedeti, buddhassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, dhammassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, sa"nghassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, agocare ca na.m passanti. imehi ^a^T4.0358^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahi dhammehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno aaka"nkhamaanaa upaasakaa appasaada.m pavedeyyu.m.

[03] ``a.t.thahi ^a^V3.0165^ea^ ^a^P4.0346^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno aaka"nkhamaanaa upaasakaa pasaada.m pavedeyyu.m. katamehi a.t.thahi? na gihiina.m alaabhaaya parisakkati, na gihiina.m anatthaaya parisakkati, na gihii akkosati paribhaasati, na gihii gihiihi bhedeti, buddhassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, dhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, sa"nghassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, gocare ca na.m passanti. imehi kho, bhikkhave ^a^M3.0159^ea^, a.t.thahi dhammehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno aaka"nkhamaanaa upaasakaa pasaada.m pavedeyyu''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 39 thoka.m visadisa.m} ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho pa.tisaara.niiyakamma.m kareyya. katamehi a.t.thahi? gihiina.m alaabhaaya parisakkati, gihiina.m anatthaaya parisakkati, gihii akkosati paribhaasati, gihii gihiihi bhedeti, buddhassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, dhammassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, sa"nghassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, dhammika~nca gihipa.tissava.m na saccaapeti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahi dhammehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho pa.tisaara.niiya.m kamma.m kareyya.

[03] ``a.t.thahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho pa.tisaara.niiyakamma.m pa.tippassambheyya. katamehi a.t.thahi? na gihiina.m alaabhaaya parisakkati, na gihiina.m anatthaaya parisakkati, na gihii akkosati paribhaasati, na gihii gihiihi bhedeti, buddhassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, dhammassa ^a^P4.0347^ea^ va.n.na.m bhaasati, sa"nghassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, dhammika~nca gihipa.tissava.m saccaapeti ^a^T4.0359^ea^. imehi kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thahi dhammehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno aaka"nkhamaano sa"ngho pa.tisaara.niiyakamma.m pa.tippassambheyyaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 211} ``tassapaapiyasikakammakatena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa a.t.thasu dhammesu sammaa vattitabba.m -- na upasampaadetabbo, na nissayo daatabbo, na saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo, na bhikkhunovaadakasammuti saaditabbaa, sammatenapi bhikkhuniyo na ovaditabbaa, na kaaci sa"nghasammuti ^a^V3.0166^ea^ saaditabbaa, na kismi~nci pacceka.t.thaane .thapetabbo, na ca tena muulena vu.t.thaapetabbo. tassapaapiyasikakammakatena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa imesu a.t.thasu dhammesu sammaa vattitabba''nti. dasama.m.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ ``raagassa ^a^T4.0360^ea^ ^a^M3.0161^ea^ ^a^V3.0168^ea^, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya a.t.tha dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame a.t.tha? sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi -- raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya ime a.t.tha dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ ``raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya a.t.tha dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame a.t.tha? ajjhatta.m ruupasa~n~nii bahiddhaa ruupaani passati parittaani suva.n.nadubba.n.naani, taani abhibhuyya `jaanaami passaamii'ti eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ajjhatta.m ruupasa~n~nii bahiddhaa ruupaani passati appamaa.naani suva.n.nadubba.n.naani, taani abhibhuyya `jaanaami passaamii'ti eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii bahiddhaa ruupaani passati parittaani suva.n.nadubba.n.naani, taani abhibhuyya `jaanaami passaamii'ti eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii bahiddhaa ruupaani passati appamaa.naani suva.n.nadubba.n.naani, taani abhibhuyya `jaanaami passaamii'ti eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ajjhatta.m ^a^P4.0349^ea^ aruupasa~n~nii bahiddhaa ruupaani passati niilaani niilava.n.naani niilanidassanaani niilanibhaasaani piitaani piitava.n.naani...pe0... lohitakaani lohitakava.n.naani...pe0... odaataani odaatava.n.naani...pe0... odaatanibhaasaani, taani abhibhuyya `jaanaami passaamii'ti eva.msa~n~nii hoti -- raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya ime a.t.tha dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ ``raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya a.t.tha dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame ^a^T4.0361^ea^ a.t.tha? ruupii ruupaani passati, ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii bahiddhaa ruupaani passati, subhanteva adhimutto hoti, sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati, sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati, sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati, sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja ^a^V3.0169^ea^ viharati, sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharati -- raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya ime a.t.tha dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''.
